Content: We visited this beach a number of times during our stay in Bali. During the day the beach is covered with lounge chairs and umbrellas to hire (we were quoted $20 for an hour) as well as people selling just about everything. In the evening, the lounges are mostly away, the bars open up and the people flock to see the sunset. The beach is wide and the water is cool and refreshing. It is relatively clean and there is plenty of space for everyone.

Content: Nusa Dua beaches have blue water but at low tide are only knee deep. Having said that, if you pick the tides you will have several hours in head high water.

Content: My husband was on the viewing platform at the water blow in Nusa Dua on 27th September, one week after Leisa M below stated 'no element of danger at all'. A huge freak wave hit the viewing platform causing part of the handrailing he was holding to collapse. This resulted in him, along with several others, being swept onto the rocks. Luckily they were pulled to safety by other tourists who were standing well back. My husband required 3 hours of surgery to repair the damage and an overnight stay at BIMC hospital, who by the way were exceptional. Three other tourists also on the path required surgery and several others suffered cuts and bruises. Please do NOT consider this area as safe.
review: husband view platform water blow nusa dua 27th september one week leisa m state element danger huge freak wave hit view platform cause part handrailing hold collapse result along several others sweep onto rock luckily pull safety tourist stand well back husband require 3 hour surgery repair damage overnight stay bimc hospital way exceptional three tourist path require surgery several others suffer cut bruise please consider area safe

Content: Seminyak Beach is Bali's most fashionable place, home to among the island's best resorts and large number of fine restaurants >

Content: Good waves, beach kind to your feet not loike in Europe, water temp good.  Not too cold.  Water not as clear as I like but waves consistent and good.Plenty of eating houses and you can buy just about anything on the beach.Great spot to visit....
review: good wave kind foot loike europe water temp good cold water clear wave consistent goodplenty eating house buy anything beachgreat spot visit

Content: Nice beach for walk, sunbathing and sunset with a glass of cocktail. It's not like Kuta beach, this beach is quite.
review: nice walk sunbathe sunset glass cocktail kuta quite

Content: Many venues overlook seminyak beach allowing you a view to sunset from a location ideal to your tastes, be they food, wine, resort or night club.
review: many venue overlook seminyak allow view sunset location ideal taste food wine resort night club

Content: The beach is NOT the highlight of Semiyak unless you enjoy raw sewage. There are a few activities and places to sunbathe but it is not an especially nice area-there are plenty of better beaches in Bali to visit.
review: highlight semiyak unless enjoy raw sewage activity place sunbathe especially nice areathere plenty good beach bali visit

Content: A beautiful wide beach down to the sea.  It's great for walking, catching some sun, or splashing through the water.  Not too many hawkers and they are generally well behaved. The water can be rough with some undertow, so one has to be careful, and pay attention to beach advisories.
review: beautiful wide sea great walk catch sun splash water many hawker generally well behaved water rough undertow one careful pay attention advisory

Content: Way better and cleaner than Kuta. You will see the most attractive Indonesian girl here. You can lie down the air-sofa and enjoy your beer or coconut water. This is called a life.
review: way well cleaner kuta will see attractive indonesian girl lie airsofa enjoy beer coconut water call life

Content: Black like dirt and smells like sewer. The sewer creek drops into the ocean making the beach even more smelly and unpleasant. And then people are wondering why they get "bali belly" Do not swim there as you literally swim in sewer.
review: black dirt smell sewer sewer creek drop ocean make even smelly unpleasant people wonder bali belly swim literally swim sewer

Content: It's a very nice beach to learn surfing as the waves are very forgiving and the sand-bottom is not as dangerous as coral bottom.. or just to chill and sun-bask... or to see the sunset..Lazy chairs and big umbrellas for rent everywhere, as well as boogieboards, surfboards, beach-tennis, etc.. soft drinks and beer, and a few local food stands are there.. For western lunch, try one of the restaurants on the otherside of the streets.. some even offers beach-deliveries.. :)BUT:- could be very busy on weekends, specially on high season. TIP: go to the very ends of the street, and you'll find less crowd there..- on those busy weekends parking can be a problem. TIP: DONT GO THERE in car, take motorbikes or bicycle instead. Some (usually local tourists) insist on going there with their (rental) car and makes it a total mess, as it's a dead-end street. - local government/village could make a fortune if they would make a pay-shower booth and pay-toilet there.
review: nice learn surf wave forgive sandbottom dangerous coral bottom chill sunbask see sunsetlazy chair big umbrellas rent everywhere well boogieboards surfboard beachtennis etc soft drink beer local food stand western lunch try one restaurant otherside street even offer beachdeliveries busy weekend specially high season tip go end street youll find less crowd busy weekend park problem tip dont go car take motorbike bicycle instead usually local tourist insist go rental car make total mess deadend street local governmentvillage make fortune make payshower booth paytoilet

Content: This view is insane. Just as it is seen on Instagram the view is incredible. There was quite a few people but it didn‚Äôt stop anyone from taking any photos and there was no queuing.Some people were waiting to get down to the beach, but the view is what you must come for. It takes a while to get here because the roads are too narrow for 2 way traffic, so plan to have enough time.
review: view insane see instagram view incredible quite people didnt stop anyone take photos queuingsome people wait view must come take road narrow 2 way traffic plan enough time

Content: Be warned this place is hard to get too only come by scooter if you are experienced with hills and turns, lots of pot holes ect we saw 4 separate accidents on the way people with bleeding legs, fallen off the bikes The views are stunning didn‚Äôt hike down as there were 100000‚Äôs of people taking photos making it unsafe as they have no idea what‚Äôs going on around them and could easily make you feel uneasyLots and lots of restaurants I believe they all only take cash It‚Äôs more expensive up there 15,000 for water 30,000 for ice cream 5,000 entrance / parking fee Stunning views very busy!!!Around an hour from nusa penida harbour to here and It‚Äôs another 30 minutes drive roughly to Angel‚Äôs billabong afterwards with even worse horrendous roads and for long stretches.
review: warned place hard come scooter experience hill turn lot pot hole ect saw 4 separate accident way people bleed legs fall bike view stun didnt hike 100000 people take photos make unsafe idea whats go around easily make feel uneasylots lot restaurant believe take cash expensive 15000 water 30000 ice cream 5000 entrance park fee stun view busyaround hour nusa penida harbour another 30 minute drive roughly angel billabong afterwards even worse horrendous road long stretch

Content: Water is murky and is actually quite rough in most areas. Lack of bars and restaurant indicates it is not really for tourists. Of 3 days we visited once for 10 minutes. Ordinary. Don‚Äôt waste your time.
review: water murky actually quite rough area lack bar restaurant indicate really tourist 3 day visit 10 minute ordinary dont waste time

Content: Very nice beach. I went in the late afternoon, and it wasn‚Äôt very crowded. The beach is very clean, and the water was clear. Nice, relaxing experience. Know that you pay to use the loungers, and there are people selling things like sunglasses and bracelets.
review: nice go late afternoon wasnt crowd clean water clear nice relax experience know pay use lounger people sell thing sunglass bracelet

Content: Visited in August 2019 and went to the beach in the morning and evening. Always crowded, rubbish everywhere and sewage running into the sea. Wouldn't recommend to anyone, beaches in NZ or AUS are so much better.
review: visit august 2019 go morning evening always crowd rubbish everywhere sewage run sea wouldnt recommend anyone beach nz aus much good

Content: Great views and always busy and things to see. Out hotel Samaya on the beach front and we did walk along and saw shrines and restaurants
review: great view always busy thing see hotel samaya front walk along saw shrine restaurant

Content: Surfing and surf shops everywhere Great beach, clean and many bars and restaurants, beds available to a fair price
review: surf surf shop everywhere great clean many bar restaurant bed available fair price

Content: Nothing more than a beautiful sunset at Seminyak beach! Arrive at 5.30pm latest and watch a clear view of the sun setting. Extremely vibrant vibe here along the beach with beach clubs and restaurants turning up the music. Expect a lot of people and patience to snap photos with nobody in it üòÖ
review: nothing beautiful sunset seminyak arrive 530pm late watch clear view sun set extremely vibrant vibe along clubs restaurant turn music expect lot people patience snap photo nobody

Content: This one word describes the beach best. I took a bike from Kuta for a day tour to Seminyak and wasn't disappointed. Lovely, clean beach that wasn't as busy as Kuta. Best part was the evening sunset walk by the beach back to Kuta.
review: one word describe best take bike kuta day tour seminyak wasnt disappoint lovely clean wasnt busy kuta best part even sunset walk back kuta

Content: Super nice day at the beach, the only downfall was getting approached all the time for renting chairs or buying goods!
review: super nice day downfall get approached time rent chair buy good

Content: Nice beach with some really good pubs / bars along the strip most of my days spent here some really good spots to have a drink an watch the sun go down üëåüëå
review: nice really good pub bar along strip day spend really good spot drink watch sun go

Content: Beach is a must see - just be ready for the market sellers there - lovely people who are there to make a living for themselves, they go around selling their wares, be polite in saying no - other tourists there just ignore them - which I found was quite rude. A nice ‚Äòthank you - but no thanks‚Äô goes a long way.
review: must see ready market seller lovely people make live go around sell ware polite say tourist ignore find quite rude nice thank thanks go long way

Content: That‚Äôs where you want to be in Bali. Avoid Kuta and all the other crowded over-fancy places. This is where you really feel the Island.Nice spot for surfing and to know people from all over the world.
review: thats want bali avoid kuta crowd overfancy place really feel islandnice spot surf know people world

Content: Absolutely stunning beach and a must see. My poor rating comes down to the rubbish littered around, lines of instagrammers and the stalls which somewhat dampens the experience.To get down to the beach is tough hike, you can see manta rays if you look off the cliff to the left side (when looking at the sea) and the road is bumpy but manageable if on scooter.
review: absolutely stunning must see poor rating come rubbish litter around line instagrammers stall somewhat dampen experienceto tough hike see manta ray look cliff leave side look sea road bumpy manageable scooter

Content: Disappointed. The beach is okey, alot of hotels and their guests here, but we will not go back. Alot more better beaches along souther part and in ulu watu. So much plastic bags, leftovers and crap along the beach so it was not nice
review: disappointed okey alot hotel guest will go back alot well beach along souther part ulu watu much plastic bag leftover crap along nice

Content: White sandy beach, in the morning high tide, in the afternoon low. It was windy, with the waves, but you can injoy in the water.
review: white sandy morning high tide afternoon low windy wave injoy water

Content: We tried to park outside but the guy took our moto and put it in the parking space where you have to pay.
review: try park outside guy take moto put park space pay

Content: This beach is within the tourist precinct and therefore the majority of local vendors are restricted and actually carry a number, if your feel aggrieved. The beach has a large tide of several meters, and can be dangerous to those not familiar with surf at high tide. At half tide, the beach is safe, at low tide the cockle hunters go out to collect food.  Many 5 Star hotels are located on this beach.
review: within tourist precinct majority local vendor restrict actually carry number feel aggrieve large tide several meter dangerous familiar surf high tide half tide safe low tide cockle hunter go collect food many 5 star hotel locate

Content: The beach itself is great, especially if after some waves....but it really needs looking after...I picked up broken glass on 2 occasions, and the amount of plastic waste coming on shore is a very sorry sight ...apart from myself and one family I saw picking the litter, I see no other effort generally...It‚Äôs all of us‚Äô problem and we need to take collective responsibility for it :-)
review: great especially wavesbut really need look afteri pick broken glass 2 occasion amount plastic waste come shore sorry sight apart one family saw pick litter see effort generallyits u problem need take collective responsibility

Content: Perhaps we are a bit spoilt but we found this beach a bit disappointing with harsh black sand and lots of people.
review: perhaps bit spoilt find bit disappointing harsh black sand lot people

Content: Seminyak has a lot of Bars and restaurant along the beach and its nice to just hang around and relax ... Clean and good for Surfing too ...
review: seminyak lot bar restaurant along nice hang around relax clean good surfing

Content: Long sandy beach that had many brightly coloured umbrellas and lounge areas to enjoy food and drink on the sand.  Lots of Lots of live music around.
review: long sandy many brightly colour umbrellas lounge area enjoy food drink sand lot lot live music around

Content: This is a very busy beach with bars and restaurants all along the front with great menus. Although it‚Äôs busy it has a buzz and plenty of beds to hire. The sunsets here are also beautiful.
review: busy bar restaurant along front great menu although busy buzz plenty bed hire sunset beautiful

Content: Good option Enjoy the nice views during sunset Suitable for coming early or at sunset Sandy nice beach area
review: good option enjoy nice view sunset suitable come early sunset sandy nice area

Content: Great busy beach but the water is a bit tough great for surfers Lots of great restaurants to choose from too
review: great busy water bit tough great surfer lot great restaurant choose

Content: It has the most amazing sunsets and best place to have a drink and some food on the beach whilst listening to music. Later in the night either a dj will play or live band !!
review: amaze sunset best place drink food whilst listen music later night either dj will play live band

Content: you need to rent a bed always need to ask for low price they told me first 120 and then i get it on 80 rupiah
review: need rent bed always need ask low price tell first 120 80 rupiah

Content: Though the way to the place is quite bumpy and looong, when you get there, it was all worth it.Too bad I went there after having too much fun in Bali Island, so when I got there, I was all tired from the nights at the club ^.^"I didn't go to the beach which waaay down there, but now that I'm home, I regretted it. I'll definitely will go again next time.
review: though way place quite bumpy looong worth ittoo bad go much fun bali island get tired night club didnt go waaay now im home regret ill definitely will go next time

Content: Beautiful view from the top and so many people will queue to take the photos at the edge facing the beach down under but be careful as you may fall down ! Some accidents happened before when people doing selfie. You may go down to Kelingking beach but the steps is dangerous and steepy. I dont recommend unless you are so fit and adventurous.You can take pictures at the dead tree and the bamboo boat paying only 5K per person.The coconut is rather expensive they charge you 25-30K for one. At this moment there is no restaurant so bring your own lunch box as the island has no many restaurants and less choice. But they do sell cup noodles.
review: beautiful view top many people will queue take photo edge face careful may fall accident happened people selfie may go kelingking step dangerous steepy dont recommend unless fit adventurousyou take picture dead tree bamboo boat pay 5k per personthe coconut rather expensive charge 2530k one moment restaurant bring lunch box island many restaurant less choice sell cup noodle

Content: We came here very early in the morning to beat the crowds! We had the whole place to ourselves and even climbed down the precarious path to the beach. The roads leading to this place are very dodgy so be cautious, if you're inexperienced on a scooter be careful!! We stayed here for a couple of hours and by the time we climbed back to the top from the beach people were arriving  and would definitely of changed our experience for the worse so make the effort in coming here early! We took lots of pictures and nobody was in any of them!The beach isn't safe to swim in either as the waves are to crazy!
review: come early morning beat crowd whole place even climb precarious path road lead place dodgy cautious youre inexperienced scooter careful stayed couple hour time climb back top people arrive definitely change experience bad make effort come early take lot picture nobody themthe isnt safe swim either wave crazy

Content: Our hotel was set on Nusa Dua beach and it is idyllic to look at. Unfortunately as water sports (jet skis, banana boats etc) are common place now the sea is polluted with petrol and oil and you can smell the fumes from the speed boat's when sunbathing. I didn't actually go into the water (no one did) presumably because of the petrol etc floating in the water. The sand is beautiful and it is a real shame that the water has been tarnished due to the popularity of motorised water sports üòû
review: hotel set nusa dua idyllic look unfortunately water sport jet ski banana boat etc common place now sea pollute petrol oil smell fume speed boat sunbathe didnt actually go water one presumably petrol etc floating water sand beautiful real shame water tarnish due popularity motorise water sport

Content: Nothing out of the ordinary, but a good beach. Went there one afternoon and there was a low tide. Cozy beach and seems to be good for surfers.
review: nothing ordinary good go one afternoon low tide cozy seem good surfer

Content: After hearing how wonderful Nusa Dua beach is, we decided to go and check it out for ourselves. We were disappointed. The sand is dirty with tiny pieces of glass and debris. The water is knee high and the beach has no personality. What a bore! Go to Echo Beach, Batu Bolong Beach (both in Canggu) or Padang Padang Beach (in Uluwatu) instead! :D
review: hear wonderful nusa dua decide go check disappointed sand dirty tiny piece glass debris water knee high personality bore go echo batu bolong canggu padang padang uluwatu instead d

Content: This is a pristine beach far from the crowds.  Have stayed at the Westin here several times and never disappointed. Highly recommend.
review: pristine far crowd stayed westin several time never disappoint highly recommend

Content: Ocean allows to bathe there, waves are not so cruel like on other beaches of Bali. Sometimes water brings too much of garbage but local people are very fast to clean up the mess
review: ocean allow bathe wave cruel beach bali sometimes water brings much garbage local people fast clean mess

Content: Small beach , where the sea water is warm but shallow . With low tide , it's like a bathtub , we can't swim . Great for small children .
review: small sea water warm shallow low tide bathtub cant swim great small child

Content: Despite the crowd - we still love this place. Even though it is starting to feel like an European resort - we hardly see many Asian tourists , which is a pity. Sunsets are really fantastic
review: despite crowd still love place even though start feel european resort hardly see many asian tourist pity sunset really fantastic

Content: The combo of the town's raw sewage flowing into the beach water, plus dangerous currents and waves which prohibit swimming make this a terrible beach for tourists.
review: combo town raw sewage flow water plus dangerous current wave prohibit swim make terrible tourist

Content: This was a good beach for us because we wanted to do some surfing as beginners and we're looking for consistent waist deep foamy waves and sand all the way out. This was a better bet for us than the beach at Canggu where the surf was too messy for beginners in August. There may be somewhere better for beginner surfers... Surf board hire 200,000 idr for 2 hours for 2 boards and rash vestsIt stays shallow here for some way out but the waves can get quite big. Not so good for swimming.The beach isn't the cleanest but only in the respect that there is the same run off into the sea as you unfortunately find on other Bali beaches. Unfortunately, like many beaches in Bali you will also find lots of polystyrene balls chocking the sand from the burst beach bean bags put out for tourists to use.
review: good u want surf beginner look consistent waist deep foamy wave sand way well bet u canggu surf messy beginner august may somewhere better beginner surfer surf board hire 200000 idr 2 hour 2 board rash vestsit stay shallow way wave quite big good swimmingthe isnt cleanest respect run sea unfortunately find bali beach unfortunately many beach bali will find lots polystyrene ball chock sand burst bean bag put tourist use

Content: Nothing special, like the whole Seminyak area. There was a weird smell at the beach and towards north it was a bit trashy. Big waves so no swimming. Sunbeds were expensive (100)
review: nothing special whole seminyak area weird smell towards north bit trashy big wave swim sunbeds expensive 100

Content: Very disappointing sand is dark water is alot colder than i expected and water very average. Wouldn't bother coming here to swim..
review: disappointing sand dark water alot colder expect water average wouldnt bother come swim

Content: Clean beach lots of kites not too crowded with lifesavers and lots of places for drinks and snacks  along the shore
review: clean lot kite crowd lifesaver lots place drink snack along shore

Content: Nice beach, even better in the evening to watch the sunset, so many restaurants offering colorful seating along the beach. Such a nice spot
review: nice even well even watch sunset many restaurant offer colorful seating along nice spot

Content: We stayed at The Royal Beach witch has direct access to the beach and what a great section of beach it is.With lots of bars and places to eat you cannot go wrong and enjoy the sunset.

Content: People always talk about Bali sunsets. The waves were very heavy , so not too much swimming. However the wide beach was the perfect backdrop to a stunning sunset

Content: All High end Resorts and great view. Very clean beach ..great view of Sunset and close from Seminyak square mall.
review: high end resort great view clean great view sunset close seminyak square mall

Content: We have been to the beach a number of times now. Just walking & enjoying people watching. It's great for anyone who enjoys the outdoors. The beach is clean & apart from the hawkers selling their wares, it's very relaxing. You can sit on the sand for free or hire a lounge with/without an umbrella, there are also been bag chairs - free if you get a drink or plastic chairs same same. Evening time sees it all come alive with music & sunset (not to be missed).
review: number time now walk enjoy people watch great anyone enjoy outdoors clean apart hawker sell ware relax sit sand free hire lounge withwithout umbrella bag chair free drink plastic chair even time see come alive music sunset miss

Content: Found the rubbish was a bit yuk,that floats from the water ways.The kids loved the water.Walking along there at night time around sunset is beautiful
review: find rubbish bit yukthat float water waysthe kid love waterwalking along night time around sunset beautiful

Content: great time, enjoy a beer and just relax for the sunset time, also you can rent a surf board and try it
review: great time enjoy beer relax sunset time rent surf board try

Content: Great beach , good vibes! Loads of restaurants on the beach to choose from! You can rent sun lounges from IDR100 000, bintangs in the beach tend to be cheaper than from the restaurants.
review: great good vibe load restaurant choose rent sun lounge idr100 000 bintangs tend cheap restaurant

Content: Very busy but quite spectacular! Took our young children and they all enjoyed running along the beach and playing in the sand.
review: busy quite spectacular take young child enjoy run along play sand

Content: I walked the whole bay from Kuta (southernmost point) to Petitenget beach (northernmost point). Best place I found for family was just north of Jl Camplung Tanduk (the road with The Royal Beach Hotel). When you get to the beach turn right and about 200 M is a place to avoid the masses, a bit quieter, Sunbeds are around 100,000 Rupiah on the beach (¬£6)
review: walked whole bay kuta southernmost point petitenget northernmost point best place find family north jl camplung tanduk road royal hotel turn right 200 m place avoid mass bit quiet sunbeds around 100000 rupiah 6

Content: The beach have everything! Nice place chilling with frds, with beers, sunset and food!! Some restaurant got live band :)
review: everything nice place chill frds beer sunset food restaurant get live band

Content: Corse sand and rough waves don't be fooled by hustlers selling seats a towel is still a great ideal. People selling aray of small gifts for your friends back home. Restaurants near by and drinking allowed whoah
review: corse sand rough wave dont fooled hustler sell seat towel still great ideal people sell aray small gift friends back home restaurant near drinking allow whoah

Content: This is a strange beach - it goes on for miles and miles but it's not like the beaches of Thailand or other comparable locations. The shoreline is very very shallow, so you can walk out about 100m and the water is still only up to your waist but the currents are very strong so you can only really swim between the designated flags and even then the waves will smash into you. The sand is dark and very fine (so pretty sticky). However, the sunset is beautiful and it's a great place to rock up, sit on bean bags with a Bintang at the end of the day. Also great if you want to go to any of the beach clubs and get the best of music, pools and the beach,
review: strange go mile mile beach thailand comparable location shoreline shallow walk 100m water still waist current strong really swim designate flag even wave will smash sand dark fine pretty sticky sunset beautiful great place rock sit bean bag bintang end day great want go clubs best music pool

Content: Where at the beach, the wave almost impossible to swim  and its happen with nature, no human can control it. Do not complaint
review: wave almost impossible swim happen nature human control complaint

Content: The beach was close to our villa so we walked here most mornings, there is a drain flowing out near the end of Double Six street which we weren't to keen on walking through so this limited the walk a little but once you are out near the breaking waves it isn't an issue. There is plenty of restaurants for breakfast on the beach too.
review: close villa walk morning drain flow near end double six street werent keen walk limited walk little near break wave isnt issue plenty restaurant breakfast

Content: Was very surprised to find that the beach and environment has been cleaned up recently, it used to be really dirty and hawkers would constantly hassle you but on this visit I found that people were left alone to enjoy it and couldn't believe the transformation, it was beautiful.  We even saw a marching band one night.
review: surprised find environment clean recently use really dirty hawker constantly hassle visit find people leave alone enjoy couldnt believe transformation beautiful even saw march band one night

Content: Didnt' really care for this beach. Water had a lot of trash floating in it. Bad Rip current. Be careful with little ones. I held on to my daughter's life vest as the waves came in and almost dragged us back out. Cant really swim there. Get some loungers and an umbrella and enjoy some Bintangs!
review: didnt really care water lot trash float bad rip current careful little one hold daughter life vest wave come almost drag u back cant really swim lounger umbrella enjoy bintangs

Content: you have to pay 5000 to park your bike and 20000 to park your carit's a robberytry the Bakso Gerobak BIru, a local meatball soup
review: pay 5000 park bike 20000 park carits robberytry bakso gerobak biru local meatball soup

Content: Such a lovey beach! Very blue sea and white sand! Lots of places to walk along the beach and many restaurants! Would probably avoid the hotel restaurants as they are expensive. Walk along to the Bali bay part of the beach and there are a range of places to eat for mostly half the price. People are around the beach trying to sell things, however if you say 'no thank you' they always leave you alone. A must visit in Nusa Dua. Also if it's a windy day you should visit waterboom which is just past the Bali bay section.
review: lovey blue sea white sand lot place walk along many restaurant probably avoid hotel restaurant expensive walk along bali bay part range place eat mostly half price people around try sell thing say thank always leave alone must visit nusa dua windy day visit waterboom past bali bay section

Content: I was disappointed. There was alot of trash in the water. The surf was so strong couldn't really swim, just stand and let the waves crash around you. Lots of surfers in training, but no real waves for them to ride, waves broke before any rideable curl. There were warning flags for rip currents and if you didn't get knocked down while waves were coming in there was a big chance they were dragging you out! We got 2 lounge chairs and an umbrella for 150k and had it for as long as we wanted. Lots of people walking around selling food and souvenirs.
review: disappointed alot trash water surf strong couldnt really swim stand let wave crash around lots surfer train real wave ride wave break rideable curl warn flag rip current didnt knock wave come big chance drag get 2 lounge chair umbrella 150k long wanted lot people walk around sell food souvenir

Content: Went down to the beach to watch the sunset and have drinks sitting on the beanbags listening to the different music in each location. Negative is the locals trying to sell you stuff all the time!
review: go watch sunset drink sit beanbags listen different music location negative local try sell stuff time

Content: Was glorious water down by la Plancha. Further North the waste water pours down in rivers from the town and I'm sure is highly polluted. The further north you go the worse it smells.
review: glorious water la plancha north waste water pour river town im sure highly polluted north go bad smell

Content: We went to the beach a few times.  We found it hard to access the beach and walked for awhile before being able to enter and same with when we walked along the beach we found it hard to exit.  Plus the beach isn't great for walking up and down so if this is what you are looking for this stretch made it tough!
review: go time find hard access walk awhile able enter walk along find hard exit plus isnt great walk look stretch make tough

Content: The fact that you can't really swim in the sea, that some sewage flows down the beach and into the sea, and that the beach is littered with rubbish, makes this not the greatest strip of beach! Maybe if you are staying at one of the beach front resorts your experience will be better, obviously it's always awesome to see the ocean. We were expecting more after reading so many great things, we thought we had missed something. The bean bag bars are the only reason to come to the coast. Shame about the drunk people trying to light Chinese lanterns, and sellers trying to sell you random crap, it's ok just to hang at one of the bars. I think if you skip this area you won't miss much.

Content: A very quirky beach once you get past the main drag of people, theirs always going to be people selling products but they're all friendly people!
review: quirky past main drag people always go people sell product theyre friendly people

Content: The beach has been cleaned up over recent years but the creeks running into the sea need further urgent attention. I would not be swimming anywhere near the creeks (read drains) but well away is fine.The sunsets are magic.

Content: Great Sunsets every day over the ocean. There are plenty of places to get cold drinks and hire couch or just sit on towel on the clean sand. I had a couple of good massages on the beach.

Content: The beach has lots of entertainment, nice bars and restaurants. The beach itself is ok, apart from the sewage streams that trickles down into the sea. It wasn't pleasant having to walk through them as you go along the beach front.. It smelt terrible and you couldn't help but think you're walking through **** Apart from that, the beach is big, has lots of places to sunbathe and is apparently great for surfing (the sea is quite rough)

Content: Nice to visit for short stay but other coastal beaches are nicer in Bali...try Uluwatu, Padang Padang or Jimbaran Bay

Content: Not the best in Bali, If you want the sunshine this is a great place. tends to get busy during afternoon.

Content: This is a really good public beach that is available 24 hours. But a couple of things: dog poo and pollution stop it being a great beach . Clean it up and you gave a 5 star to

Content: My partner and I strolled down to the beach from our resort not knowing what to expect, lots of restaurants with bean bags, lights and great food, some even had live music, great night

Content: Nice beach, not as crowded as kuta. Beach chairs with umbrellas to rent really cheap and nice. Our hotel was right on this beach very nice. Fun restaurants to watch the sunset on this beach
review: nice crowd kuta chair umbrellas rent really cheap nice hotel right nice fun restaurant watch sunset

Content: To me this was just a beach, nice view from sitting up at Resturant. But water is not great, beach was not 100% clean, rubbish about a bit. Ultimately, there is better choice for nicer beaches over on Bali.
review: nice view sit resturant water great 100 clean rubbish bit ultimately well choice nicer beach bali

Content: As my other half was unable to surf this year (injuries) and we had already booked, I was dubious about Canggu this time. We swam each morning early - the beach is black sand and typical of Bali. However it was refreshing and challenging at times with the shore break - but doable. We were the only swimmers amongst the surfers!

Content: Nice sand but dirty beach... Many massage center and bars.. Very quiet but the water is not deep at all..

Content: It is a white sandy beach with full of mid and high level resorts along. If you want to swim you should avoid going there in the afternoon otherwise you will face a swampy place due to low tide which is not reflecting the turquoise blue pictures at all and you will be disappointed.

Content: For those of you who dont have a lot of time in bali, you can try seminyak beach. Instead of doing nothing at hotel, enjoy the beach here or eat near the seminyak beach, it offers a lot of restaurant / cafe

Content: I was shocked there were so few people on this stretch of beach! Everyone seemed to crowd down around Kuta, but up in Seminyak we had so much room to ourselves.

Content: We went here a few times during our stay in seminyak. Sun lounges by day.... Bean bags by night. Or just lay down a towel and enjoy it. Beautiful spot to watch the sunset.
review: go time stay seminyak sun lounge day bean bag night lay towel enjoy beautiful spot watch sunset

Content: Great beach to sit back relax and watch the day go by.......and the people of course! Only thing is I much prefer an Aussie beach as I would not trust the water or what could be floating in it. Large waves and strong undercurrents. Great place to watch the sun go down though with a beer in hand!
review: great sit back relax watch day go byand people course thing much prefer aussie trust water float large wave strong undercurrent great place watch sun go though beer hand

Content: Huge waves.. But noone surfing or swimming..this tells me dangerous undercurrent..great sunset. I'm.a convert next time .to look at hotels here. Beach relatively clean
review: huge wave noone surf swimmingthis tell dangerous undercurrentgreat sunset ima convert next time look hotel relatively clean

Content: I thought I'd go to the beach and relax and read a book. That didn't happen. I was harassed for about two hours by hawkers. I kept saying no and they kept coming. I went to walk away and someone grabbed me and yelled at me for not buying anything. I would never go back and I am not impressed at all.
review: thought id go relax read book didnt happen harass two hour hawker keep say kept come go walk away someone grab yelled buying anything never go back impressed

Content: i likes this beach the most because of the waves which were great for surfing if you are not a surfer you can easily find a trainer which a good price an excellent area for relaxing
review: like wave great surf surfer easily find trainer good price excellent area relaxing

Content: Definitely not a swimming beach so be aware that if you book hotels near you cannot swim (too many rips).  Great for a walk on the beach or sunbathing.
review: definitely swim aware book hotel near swim many rip great walk sunbathe

Content: A nice place to go and see the sun set, of you do not want to go to Potato head or a hotel , find a beany bag place and just sit down with a beer and enjoy the sunset and the vibe
review: nice place go see sun set want go potato head hotel find beany bag place sit beer enjoy sunset vibe

Content: The public beach is nice and there are a variety of restaurants!  You seem to need to purchase something to get a chair - but you can bring your own blanket and rest on the beach for free!
review: public nice variety restaurant seem need purchase something chair bring blanket rest free

Content: I visited the place with our little one.Big beach with lots of good surf. Days of wave did alternate so easy wave days were good for the little ones to paddle and stay safe.Disappointed though with the cleanness of the beach. Rubbish floating around the waters edge.Also  certain parts smelt so a sewage outlet may have been near by.The beaches volcanic residue means bathing suits get ruined so only wear dark coloured ones if you plan to do beach sand castle building. It would have been nice to have more beach restaurants as there were only big ones attached to hotels. The ones that were there had a high security manned setup, so not sure if the Bali bombing in Dec 2004 (?) stopped all all the smaller restaurants doing business. Would still visit the beach but keep it cleaner please.
review: visited place little onebig lot good surf day wave alternate easy wave day good little one paddle stay safedisappointed though cleanness rubbish float around water edgealso certain part smelt sewage outlet may near bythe beach volcanic residue mean bath suit ruin wear dark colour one plan sand castle building nice restaurant big one attach hotel one high security man setup sure bali bomb dec 2004 stop small restaurant business still visit keep clean please

Content: Out of Kuta, Legian and Seminyak; Seminyak is the one with access to high-end beach clubs and hotels. However, Legian is better situated, waves are both for surfing and playing in water. There are more beach side warrungs and more sunbeds. Seminyak isn't bad either as long as you are chilling at one of the beach clubs.
review: kuta legian seminyak seminyak one access highend club hotel legian well situate wave surf play water side warrungs sunbeds seminyak isnt bad either long chill one club

Content: Lovely beach, interesting waves, loads of food, it's like the perfect set up, but the open sewers running onto and across the beach, which people ignore and simply walk through, kind of grosses me out. It's like this on other beaches along this southern stretch of coast too so it's just one of those things. Unless you want to walk for miles along the beach you may not even notice it. I noticed it a lot! The touts are there but they are not aggressive or persistent. Mainly just selling sarongs and paintings and sometimes quite odd things. But they don't pressure or annoy, they are just there.  Unlike the JetSki and paragliding touts in Patong who block your path and follow you and won't leave you alone!
review: lovely interest wave load food perfect set open sewer run onto across people ignore simply walk kind gross beach along southern stretch coast one thing unless want walk mile along may even notice notice lot tout aggressive persistent mainly sell sarong painting sometimes quite odd thing dont pressure annoy unlike jetski paragliding tout patong block path follow wont leave alone

Content: Nice beach, less beach vendors, less surfers and less tourist than the more famous Kuta beach. Good alternative for a lazy day at beach or enjoying the sunset.
review: nice less vendor less surfer less tourist famous kuta good alternative lazy day enjoy sunset

Content: The beach is actually not too special, but if you are looking for a different atmosphere, and already bored with the beaches of Seminyak, Kuta what else .... So the beach is very suitable to be a distraction :)One with a swampy coastline and echo beach.
review: actually special look different atmosphere already bored beach seminyak kuta suitable distraction one swampy coastline echo

Content: Pick your spot very carefully as distinct smell of sewage on parts of the beach! Whilst we were there it was extremely windy with HUGE waves so large parts of the water were out of bounds...a bit disappointing.
review: pick spot carefully distinct smell sewage part whilst extremely windy huge wave large part water boundsa bit disappointing

Content: There are a lot of hard particles on the beach which we reckon are dead broken corals. Therefore, please do not be bare footed to prevent from getting cut.
review: lot hard particle reckon dead broken coral please bare foot prevent get cut

Content: Much of the time tide is low, so can not swin. No waves as they break well off shore at the reef. Maybe people don't swim here because the jellyfish signs scare them?? Sand is not White.. not sure why everyone;'s review says this bui there is nowhere on Bali with White sand it is grainy yellow. If you want White go to Philippines :)
review: much time tide low swin wave break well shore reef maybe people dont swim jellyfish sign scare sand white sure everyones review say bui nowhere bali white sand grainy yellow want white go philippine

Content: If entering by the temple, then choose the path by the square, not the alleyway, as there is waste water being drained from the hotel(?) straight onto the beach and into the sea water and you will have to walk through it to get to the quieter part of the beach.  If entering by the square, take a left when you reach the beach as you will not experience the pungent smells from the waste water being blown in the wrong direction.If hiring a lounge, don't pay more than 20000rph per person for a few hours.Stay until sunset - worth waiting for!
review: enter temple choose path square alleyway waste water drain hotel straight onto sea water will walk quiet part enter square take leave reach will experience pungent smell waste water blow wrong directionif hire lounge dont pay 20000rph per person hoursstay sunset worth wait

Content: Like most beaches in Bali, it's dirty. Sand is black and full of rubbish and the water is the same. Didn't swim, only went in the water at our villa
review: beach bali dirty sand black full rubbish water didnt swim go water villa

Content: Hire a bed and stay for the day. If you don't want to buy, be firm and say ' no thankyou' don't show any interest or be prepared they will all flock, so decide what you want to buy and stick to it!
review: hire bed stay day dont want buy firm say thankyou dont show interest prepare will flock decide want buy stick

Content: just a beach with surf breaks. the sand is a dirty brown color not white or golden.. also come when the currents are running the wrong way and you may as well try swimming at the local tip
review: surf break sand dirty brown color white golden come current run wrong way may well try swim local tip

Content: first of all I don't like dark sand as it looks dirty but here it didn't help that it smelled badly as well
review: first dont dark sand look dirty didnt help smell badly well

Content: I visited in 2010 for the first time and was taken aback by the stunning sunset, however even then the beach itself wasn't great, and it grossly deteriorated ever since. Dirty, grey-ish sand, lots of rubbish, which is not cleaned. The water was murky and muddy, and wasn't inviting at all. One of the locals on a later visit also advised me that it wasn't 'good' to swim, especially after the rain, when all the inland rubbish gets washed via the streams into the bay. I saw lots of nasties floating in those streams, so would agree with that advice. It's such a shame that no one takes responsibility for keeping it clean, as it would have attracted many more tourists if it was maintained. The sunsets are beautiful and many people come to the beach-side bars just for it. Any beach-going experience will most certainly be interrupted by the local hawkers trying to sell you something.
review: visited 2010 first time take aback stunning sunset even wasnt great grossly deteriorate dirty greyish sand lot rubbish cleaned water murky muddy wasnt invite one local later visit advise wasnt good swim especially rain inland rubbish get washed via stream bay saw lot nasties float stream agree advice shame one take responsibility keep clean attract many tourist maintain sunset beautiful many people come beachside bar beachgoing experience will certainly interrupt local hawker try sell something

Content: Average type beach, Personally i would perfer Kuat beach although Seminyak is alot quieter it is alot dirtier with rubbish and broken glass frequently seen along the beach/waters edge. So manhy rips formed it was unsafe to swim the whole time we were there (1 week) Make the effort and vsiit nusa dua beach if your looking for the 5 star beaches in bali or always try Kuta beach and find a qutei becach bar top enjoy a few cold bevys.
review: average type personally perfer kuat although seminyak alot quieter alot dirtier rubbish broken glass frequently see along beachwaters edge manhy rip form unsafe swim whole time 1 week make effort vsiit nusa dua look 5 star beach bali always try kuta find qutei becach bar top enjoy cold bevy

Content: Grab a lounger for a fee or put your towel on the sand for free.  Beach is nice and wide and not crowded compared to European beaches (although those of us from NZ or Aus might find it a bit busier than we prefer!).  Beware of strong undercurrents and keep within your depth - there are lifeguards but not everywhere.  Good beginner surfing waves
review: grab lounger fee put towel sand free nice wide crowd compare european beach although u nz aus might find bit busy prefer beware strong undercurrent keep within depth lifeguard everywhere good beginner surf wave

Content: Seminyak Beach is a wide stretch of beach, and is not as crowded as, say, Kuta Beach.There's also plenty of restaurants by the beach - perfect for sunset viewing.
review: seminyak wide stretch crowd say kuta beachtheres plenty restaurant perfect sunset view

Content: There are alot of little bars run by locals along the beach but look out for "Molly's Bar' (almost directly infront of the Hard Rock Cafe), Molly is a dog the bar is named after - great owners! Very Friendly
review: alot little bar run local along look molly bar almost directly infront hard rock cafe molly dog bar name great owner friendly

Content: I live in a part of the world with the best beaches and found the dark gritty sand plus the fact I was unable to avoid walking through drain muck I found vey  unappealling in Seminyak. Getting to the beach was  difficult as they have used every bit of the prime real estate to build on. Suggest going to Potatoe Head with infinity pool overlooking ocean. If you don't mind the music.
review: live part world best beach find dark gritty sand plus fact unable avoid walk drain muck find vey unappealling seminyak get difficult use every bit prime real estate build suggest go potatoe head infinity pool overlook ocean dont mind music

Content: Very clean and not as busy as nearby Kuta.  There is a strong current and big waves which are ideal for surfers but maybe keep your eye on kids or those who are not strong swimmers
review: clean busy nearby kuta strong current big wave ideal surfer maybe keep eye kid strong swimmer

Content: Lovely beach where you can relax,swim and unwindThere are bars on the beach with music and diningThere's also a bean bag bar which is so bohoThere are tables with lamps and beanbags-finished off nicely with a Bintang !:)
review: lovely relaxswim unwindthere bar music diningtheres bean bag bar bohothere table lamp beanbagsfinished nicely bintang

Content: Enjoy the wam water and the excellent service provided by the many resturants located by the seaside ,lots of entertainment in the evening .

Content: The beach stretch about 3 miles with soft dark sand. Its very crowded because we came in holiday season. There is many cafe along the beach.

Content: great beach, lots of seating and good bars close by....................................................
review: great lot seat good bar close

Content: We love the soft sand and long beach. Walking along it feels great. If you get a spot in front of happening clubs, you can enjoy great music with sea breeze

Content: Very excellent beach with white sands, clean and only 30 minutes from Kuta. Location always be traffic jam on midday.All expensive in Seminyak. We rent 4 beach seats for 400K IDR with hard bargain to local man but he's very take care of us. Many small restaurants and bars surrounding beach, also hotels, shopping centres and spa services.Really made us relax for sleeping and swimming on Seminyak beach.

Content: Seminyak beach, is not very good for swimming due to the large waves rolling in, however great for surfing, and the sand is course and brown.
review: seminyak good swimming due large wave roll great surf sand course brown

Content: Come to Seminyak beach for a sunset.  Get here before 5pm and choose one of the many beach bars to plonk yourself down on one of the colorful beanbags, order some tapas and a Bintang and listen to trendy music while the sun goes down.  Bali sunsets never fail to disappoint.
review: come seminyak sunset 5pm choose one many bar plonk one colorful beanbag order tapa bintang listen trendy music sun go bali sunset never fail disappoint

Content: Seminyak Beach is a very nice beach in Bali. Great to walk along - you can walk down to Kuta and for stunning sunsets since it is on the West side of the island. Housing many numerous hotels, restaurants and bars, Seminyak is somewhat more sophisticated than its sister Kuta. It has a decent stretch of whitish sand, and the water is okay. Currents could also be strong so be careful when you swim in here and respect all instructions from lifeguards and the hotel staff. Cool beach to hang out on and watch the surfers do  their thing.
review: seminyak nice bali great walk along walk kuta stun sunset west side island housing many numerous hotel restaurant bar seminyak somewhat sophisticated sister kuta decent stretch whitish sand water okay current strong careful swim respect instruction lifeguard hotel staff cool hang watch surfer thing

Content: Beautiful beach with huge waves. We loved walking along this beach everyday during our trip.When the tide gets low the sand has a reflective glow and it is quite an amazing sight to behold. The sunsets were beautiful too. Most importantly there aren't any annoyingly persistent touts and vendors like what I've experienced in Kuta before.
review: beautiful huge wave love walk along everyday tripwhen tide get low sand reflective glow quite amazing sight behold sunset beautiful importantly arent annoyingly persistent tout vendor ive experience kuta

Content: Come here for the experience of watching the sunset on colorful bean bags with hundreds of other people, and for some decent swimming when conditions are not too rough. However the beach can be pretty annoying too with a lot of commercialization and pollution ...
review: come experience watch sunset colorful bean bag hundred people decent swim condition rough pretty annoy lot commercialization pollution

Content: Dislike: Black sand, Garbage, Dogs, Dog's poop, Like: Sorry tell you the truth, nothing I like from this beach

Content: The section we were staying on was maintained by the resort hotels that run along it and was spotless and at low tide there is a load of puffer fish can be found in the seaweed in the shallow water. If you take goggles you can find hermit crabs, sea urchins (not many but watch your step) and baby lobsters. No hawkers on our section either but if you go up to the public section there are a few but if you're not interested and politely refuse they'll wander on and leave you alone.
review: section stay maintain resort hotel run along spotless low tide load puffer fish find seaweed shallow water take goggles find hermit crab sea urchins many watch step baby lobsters hawker section either go public section youre interested politely refuse theyll wander leave alone

Content: Being from Australia it's hard to find better beaches elsewhere, but rubbish on the beach is just a big no! If you want to swim in a clean ocean or lie on a lovely sandy beach I wouldn't recommend Bali.

Content: The beach isnt that clean and the waves at this end arent that high. More a spot for water-sports - para sailing, speed boat riding etc. The beach is lined with different stalls for water sports, and the moment you arrive you are surrounded by there representatives to get you to sign up with them.   One should take a look at a few of these stalls and then decide. The water sports seem to be decently priced but the time allotted to you is pretty short.
review: isnt clean wave end arent high spot watersports para sail speed boat rid etc line different stall water sport moment arrive surround representative sign one take look stall decide water sport seem decently price time allot pretty short

Content: View aside, the journey just to get there is quite something. Not for the faint hearted if driving round blind bends is not your thingBut be assured once you arrive it's unlikely you'll have seen anything quite like this place Very very busy and the route down to the beach is tight and equally as busyKeep an eye out for the monkeys too!!

Content: Took a walk down seminyak beach with my 2 teenage boys and it was sad to see the amount of rubbish lying on the beach. There  is a stream that flows into the sea there also and it is basically a dustbin with all sorts of rubbish dumped in it which is flowing into the ocean. It is very sad and it is something the Indonesian government needs to address. Aside from that the beach is a surfers beach with huge waves. Could be so beautiful.....
review: take walk seminyak 2 teenage boy sad see amount rubbish lie stream flow sea basically dustbin sort rubbish dump flow ocean sad something indonesian government need address aside surfer huge wave beautiful

Content: We went to go to the beach only to find that to get on and off the beach, if you are not staying at the beachfront resorts is a nightmare. You have to walk miles out of your way to get on and off the beach which has open drains emptying into it that smell terrible. I hated walking through the dirty water.
review: go go find stay beachfront resort nightmare walk mile way open drain empty smell terrible hat walk dirty water

Content: Beach is great for sunsets, waves were big, san was dirty and stray dogs everywhere. Prefer the Australian beaches!
review: great sunset wave big san dirty stray dog everywhere prefer australian beach

Content: Good beach. Sun beds and umbrellas available. The sea breeze keeps the temperature very pleasant. Not too crowded. The waves however are very high, even at a shallow depth. Not suitable for younger children.  Surprisingly few surfers.
review: good sun bed umbrellas available sea breeze keep temperature pleasant crowd wave high even shallow depth suitable young child surprisingly surfer

Content: Go here if you like to enjoy the sunset while having a nice cocktail on the beach. Lots of beach bars and beach clubs to choose from. A bit more expensive then Kuta, but therefore also a bit more stylish.
review: go enjoy sunset nice cocktail lot bar club choose bit expensive kuta bit stylish

Content: This looked like a nice beach, especially where they had groomed the sand. The area closer to the water that had not been groomed, had lots of small bits of rubbish (mainly bottle tops) on it. There was lots of sun loungers and drink/food stalls along the beach front. Several areas had ‚Äòsurfing lessons‚Äô available.
review: looked nice especially groomed sand area closer water groom lot small bit rubbish mainly bottle top lot sun lounger drinkfood stall along front several area surf lesson available

Content: I like this beach. Nothing much to fault but i just wish the washroom can be free and more water points to wash off our sandy feet.

Content: Stayed at Pelangi Hotel and Spa which is right next to Seminyak beach. The beach is clean and has some good waves. There are heaps of restaurants and bars along the beach which have either undercover/outdoors  tables and chairs or outdoors lounges and beach bags. A great spot to sunbake and swim during the day. And a fantastic spot to have a cocktail and feed while watching the sunset. Loved it.
review: stay pelangi hotel spa right next seminyak clean good wave heap restaurant bar along either undercoveroutdoors table chair outdoors lounge bag great spot sunbake swim day fantastic spot cocktail feed watch sunset love

Content: A real sight to behold. The litter all around is an absolute disgrace. A real sad reflection on the visitors! Content: We stayed along this beach for a week.  We tried to go snorkelling and quickly found out that the sea was teeming with sea lice which made the experience uncomfortable, but worse, the water had a lot of debris in it....lots of plastic bags.....even this slice of paradise is polluted. Pity.

Content: The beach goes on forever, its very clean, the sea is warm and very wavey - too strong even for surfing throughout our visit. Content: This is the perfect place to watch the sun go down. It is very popular with locals and tourists alike and you can see why. It is clean and very pleasant and perfect for a stroll

Content: Arrived at the beach on our first night after dark, no idea or concept what lay in front of us! We ate at one of the beach places that had bean bags on the sand whilst we listened to the live music. Nice and sandy beach and seemed clean.Next morning we came back down to spend the day and were welcomed by the most amazing surf and sandy beach! Miles long with plenty of space.We hired a couple of sun beds (haggle- we got them down to 100,000 rupees for two for the whole day).Stay till the sun goes down, the colours are amazing!Watch out for the stray dogs though.Great beach.

Content: Highly recommended- great beach without the crowds.  Waves and tides can be very strong though so stay aware.

Content: The beach is great for walking along. It us windy which makes it pleasant. I did venture in for a dip but I came out stinking. This may have something to do with sewage system near the beach. There are many hotel restaurants to stop and have a drink or meal.

Content: A nicw beach. Unless nusa Dua beach which is white sand beach this beach is a black sand beach. A great place to learn surfing and located near to market area. Best time to visit is early morning by 8:30.
review: nicw unless nusa dua white sand black sand great place learn surf locate near market area best time visit early morning 830

Content: What a truly charming place. The people are so friendly. The bars are great the health food shops amazing. Highly recommended for all ages!!!
review: truly charming place people friendly bar great health food shop amaze highly recommend age

Content: I've lived in Bali for 10 years now and have to say that I really really miss the old canggu... The hipster surf tourist trap that it's become makes me sad enough to cry real tears. It was so nice back when it was just cows, Black sand, a few little places to eat breakfast, and good uncrowded surf... but such is Bali.
review: ive live bali 10 year now say really really miss old canggu hipster surf tourist trap become make sad enough cry real tear nice back cow black sand little place eat breakfast good uncrowded surf bali

Content: Scammers around the public toilet block it off and demand a 5000 rupiah payment if you need to use it. What a crap place. People will just end up urinating in the water. First place I've ever visited that needed a payment to relieve yourself.
review: scammer around public toilet block demand 5000 rupiah payment need use crap place people will end urinating water first place ive visit needed payment relieve

Content: This beach is always busy. Considering the surge of growth over the past 20yrs. It was the dead end of bali. Now you cant park and is very full. The inlet river to the right is not the best and is sometimes very dirty depending on the day.
review: always busy consider surge growth past 20yrs dead end bali now cant park full inlet river right best sometimes dirty depend day

Content: This beach is nice.  The regular beach sellers like to target foreigners but are not intimidating.  The black sand stains your clothes and your feet so you might want to wash off when you leave.  The beach has an array of bars and several live bands playing....it almost seems like battle of the bands but sitting in the right place will drown out the sound of nearby bands.
review: nice regular seller target foreigner intimidate black sand stain clothes foot might want wash leave array bar several live band playingit almost seem battle band sit right place will drown sound nearby band

Content: Water was very far out due to the low tide for most of the day which was frustrating, because the beach is beautiful when there's enough water to swim. Water sports offered along the beach are quite pricy and can be quite annoying. The beach itself has potential, but the low tide during the day took away the option of a nice swim in the sun which was disappointing.
review: water far due low tide day frustrate beautiful there enough water swim water sport offer along quite pricy quite annoy potential low tide day take away option nice swim sun disappointing

Content: Nice sandy beach but small. Low tide at times so not possible to go into the sea. Not suitable for very young children as the water isnt very calm
review: nice sandy small low tide time possible go sea suitable young child water isnt calm

Content: went down to watch the sunset many times - beautiful.saw the lanterns being let off & went to find them but couldnt - would have loved tolet one off.
review: go watch sunset many time beautifulsaw lantern let go find couldnt love tolet one

Content: If you go there expecting white sand beaches, you will be disappointed.  The sand is brown.  The water is somewhat green, not like the exotic beaches in Mexico or Hawaii.  We just walked a bit and left.
review: go expect white sand beach will disappoint sand brown water somewhat green exotic beach mexico hawaii walk bit leave

Content: We did shopping and late lunch at Urchin Restaurant,  Then we went to the beach crossing a sewer, Indonesia lacks a well planned system as the beach is subject to trash, dogpoo and sewage.
review: shopping late lunch urchin restaurant go cross sewer indonesia lack well plan system subject trash dogpoo sewage

Content: This beach although more crowded, its pretty long and has some very nice restaurants lined up near the shore. One can relax here while getting some pretty good grub too
review: although crowd pretty long nice restaurant line near shore one relax get pretty good grub

Content: watching the surfersEating your corn on the beachHaving a drink in one of the bars thereFeel the waves
review: watch surferseating corn beachhaving drink one bar therefeel wave

Content: Loved the waves and the water. Suitable for swimming but dont venture out too far! THe undertow can be strong at times
review: love wave water suitable swimming dont venture far undertow strong time

Content: This beach is used for many different things, religious ceremonies, family group outings (on Sunday as it's their day off), and of course for tourists parading their new swimwear!   Every few metres is a bar, some have food others have loungers, and a lot of them have public toilets.  Some charge a few coins others are free.    On our last day we noticed groups of workers on the beach collecting litter and debris from the previous days' high tides.  Nice to see.
review: use many different thing religious ceremony family group outing sunday day course tourist parade new swimwear every metre bar food others lounger lot public toilet charge coin others free last day notice group worker collect litter debris previous day high tide nice see

Content: If you like your swim in the sea a little bit on the rough side this is a great. Kid took surfing lessons, the waves and current were a bit rough; we were immediately warned and pulled back whenever we ventured a bit too deep. The beach is clean and so is the water, don't know why some visitors have expressed otherwise. I loved it.
review: swim sea little bit rough side great kid take surf lesson wave current bit rough immediately warn pull back whenever ventured bit deep clean water dont know visitor express love

Content: Food is delicious. Place is Awsm. Nd the most beautiful is I enjoyed a lot there. When I go with my frnds.  ...We enjoy soo much.
review: food delicious place awsm nd beautiful enjoyed lot go frnds enjoy soo much

Content: We loved the beach with the fantastic bars. The bean bags and umbrellas were really colourful and most bars had live music. Really chilled. Even the beach vendors were fun to watch and not pushy.
review: love fantastic bar bean bag umbrella really colourful bar live music really chill even vendor fun watch pushy

Content: We were down the expensive resort end of seminyak so quiet down there. People were flying the big kites
review: expensive resort end seminyak quiet people fly big kite

Content: We spent several days here and liked this beach way more than Jimbaran Bay.  It is cleaner and has nicer sand and waves.
review: spent several day like way jimbaran bay clean nice sand wave

Content: Beautiful beach during in Bali. We enjoy for swim and sunset...This place good for family. And peoples was friendly
review: beautiful bali enjoy swim sunsetthis place good family people friendly

Content: Its one of famous spot for sunset. A little crowded but still good to see sunset.Have may bars on the beach with bean bed.. so u can relax and having a good time
review: one famous spot sunset little crowded still good see sunsethave may bar bean bed u relax good time

Content: Seminyak beach is a nice large beach to walk along with lots of bars / restaurants to enjoy. It is not an overly clean beach - we come across a lot of dog poo! And the sand isn't golden white. We wouldn't attempt to swim either as the sea is very tidal and wavy. However, it has beautiful sunset views, is lovely to walk along and is very wide. It's definitely worth a visit but it isn't your relaxing beautiful Caribbean beach.
review: seminyak nice large walk along lot bar restaurant enjoy overly clean come across lot dog poo sand isnt golden white wouldnt attempt swim either sea tidal wavy beautiful sunset view lovely walk along wide definitely worth visit isnt relax beautiful caribbean

Content: Our daughters were up for trying surfing and according to locals here, it should be Seminyak, so we hired a driver and went to the west coast.Water was more waves than east coast (Sanur) where we stayed.We found a place with some goid lical instructors and the girls had fun surfing for a couple of hours.Price was 150K for approx. 2 hours, so ok.Also great clean sandy beach and at least this day no plastic and rubbish lykng around.So overall a great day at Seminyak beach.
review: daughter try surf accord local seminyak hire driver go west coastwater wave east coast sanur stayedwe find place goid lical instructor girls fun surf couple hoursprice 150k approx 2 hour okalso great clean sandy least day plastic rubbish lykng aroundso overall great day seminyak

Content: Bali is a lovely country with friendly people. Seminyak is a lively, trendy place that caters well for all ages and tastes. However, beware on the beach especially that can be full of dog excrement that dog walkers leave and do not pick up. We watched many just leave it, or even cover it with sand. Then, some unsuspecting walker stands in it with bare feet. Not good. As a seasoned, worldwide traveller this is the worst place I have seen with regards animal faeces. The pavements in the town can also be full of the same. It's a shame as it it's the only downside of a great place.
review: bali lovely country friendly people seminyak lively trendy place caters well age taste beware especially full dog excrement dog walker leave pick watch many leave even cover sand unsuspecting walker stand bare foot good season worldwide traveller bad place see regard animal faeces pavement town full shame downside great place

Content: The beach is clean and nice but the facilities not too good. Kuta beach or Nusa dua is better and more fun
review: clean nice facility good kuta nusa dua good fun

Content: The beach is clean and nice . But the tide timings should be kept in mind . The tide timings differ everyday . Its available on the resorts on the beachside like potato house and W.
review: clean nice tide timing keep mind tide timing differ everyday available resort beachside potato house w

Content: This beach is not great, especially down the end with all the beach clubs. Head to Legian or Uluwatu if you want to swim in the ocean. Nice to watch the sunset though and plenty of beach bars to sit and drink.
review: great especially end club head legian uluwatu want swim ocean nice watch sunset though plenty bar sit drink

Content: Sunset has changed but still fun. So many bean bags and bintang offers. The beach has always been a great spot for people watching and remains that way. I lo e coming down and spending time watching all the activities
review: sunset change still fun many bean bag bintang offer always great spot people watch remain way lo e come spending time watch activity

Content: Very surprised at how clean this beach was. Excellent surf beach with plenty of places to hire boards etc. Peaceful and not harassed. Kids had a great time.
review: surprised clean excellent surf plenty place hire board etc peaceful harass kid great time

Content: Many cafe/restaurant with sand floor along the beach with many choice off local/Italian/western.Clean beach best place to enjoying sunset or surfing..
