Content: Seminyak Beach is a long stretch of grey sandy beach situated in an upscale and private neighbourhood thats famous for its fabulous sunsets....
review: seminyak long stretch grey sandy situate upscale private neighbourhood thats famous fabulous sunset

Content: Loved this beach. It has a nice vibe to it. It‚Äôs peaceful and the sunset is amazing. Colourful and unique.
review: love nice vibe peaceful sunset amaze colourful unique

Content: Several good places to eat and drink on the beach. Several excellent hotels with different type of services to be used. Service people cleaning the beach all day long.
review: several good place eat drink several excellent hotel different type service use service people clean day long

Content: This was the first time we came to Canggu. Our friends suggested it to go surfing. It had heaps of people out surfing but really sad to see how filthy the water was. The oil could be seen in every break of a wave and even human waste. Not a place I would swim. The beach bars closed pretty early and had a much quieter vibe than other places. Just really sad to see how dirty it was.
review: first time come canggu friend suggest go surf heap people surf really sad see filthy water oil see every break wave even human waste place swim bar close pretty early much quieter vibe place really sad see dirty

Content: The issues with this beach is the amount of bars and businesses operating on it. There is filth and grime everywhere. The ocean itself has various plastic objects floating around the shore at all times. I know this is a local money maker but the impact on local conservation is alarming. A clean beach brings other forms of income too.
review: issue amount bar business operate filth grime everywhere ocean various plastic object float around shore time know local money maker impact local conservation alarm clean brings form income

Content: I was really disappointed with this beach. There is loads of rubbish and overall a but grotty. There are loads of dogs roaming around just doing their business everywhere so was worried where I was walking. At sunset there is quite a nice buzz but overall it didn't live up to what I was expecting.
review: really disappointed load rubbish overall grotty load dog roam around business everywhere worry walk sunset quite nice buzz overall didnt live expect

Content: Beah was dirty, with toxic materials (similar to orange paint) causing beach closure. Further down (+ a km) beach was open, but couch hire (offered at exhorbitant rates - negotiate down from A$20 ph) only option - and couches were as clean as the beach. Walk down, swim between the (infrequent) flags, and head back to the hotel pool.
review: beah dirty toxic material similar orange paint cause closure km open couch hire offer exhorbitant rate negotiate a20 ph option couch clean walk swim infrequent flag head back hotel pool

Content: Sadly there was a level of plastic in the water which was annoying. However people came every day to clean, so they are making an effort to improve.
review: sadly level plastic water annoy people come every day clean make effort improve

Content: On photographs this beach looks like it is white and powdery like the ones found in Cuba, Mexico and Dominican but sadly we were disappointed to find a darker grainier sand and definitely needed sea shoes as my youngest son trod on an urchin on first day of our holiday and had to have several black small spines removed with tweezers.Looks so different when the tide goes out.
review: photograph look white powdery one find cuba mexico dominican sadly disappointed find darker grainier sand definitely need sea shoe young son trod urchin first day holiday several black small spine remove tweezerslooks different tide go

Content: Not a very clean beach which is unfortunate. Walking on the sand is also full of rubbish and glass so be mindfull.
review: clean unfortunate walking sand full rubbish glass mindfull

Content: At high tide it ceases to exist, and at low tide you wade through garbage. Would not plan on going there ever.
review: high tide cease exist low tide wade garbage plan go

Content: During the period I was in Seminyak the wind blew all the rubbish and waste onshore. Leaving the beaches littered and the sea dirty. I'm used to seeing this while traveling and unfortunately a reality of the way in which plastic is dealt with in this part of the world.
review: period seminyak wind blow rubbish waste onshore leave beach litter sea dirty im use see travel unfortunately reality way plastic dealt part world

Content: I'm not sure where some of these other reviewers went but in early April 2017 there was simply not much beach left. Waves crashed right up to the restaurants and it was virtually impossible to walk along the beach! There was a larger amount of dirty grey sand near the temple which was full of rubbish and dogs. The lesson I repeatedly learn is that if I want white pristine beaches I should just stay at home ( Australia ) Make sure you book a place with a pool
review: im sure reviewer go early april 2017 simply much leave wave crash right restaurant virtually impossible walk along large amount dirty grey sand near temple full rubbish dog lesson repeatedly learn want white pristine beach stay home australia make sure book place pool

Content: Parts of the beach are dirty, not clean, littered and there are lots of dogs and some dog mess. We expected the beaches and cost line to be stunning and I am sure some are, however this is not quite one of those beaches. Disappointing!
review: part dirty clean litter lot dog dog mess expect beach cost line stun sure quite one beach disappoint

Content: Seminyak is just full of high end shops and bars and very expensive beach clubs and hotels.The beach is very average the water doesn't not clean, you only have to look in the little creeks to feed onto the beach to see the quality of the water , most people just use the swimming poolsThe one very annoying thing is the people that drive around in early hours of the morning on loud motorbikes disturbing everybody that's trying to sleep.
review: seminyak full high end shop bar expensive club hotelsthe average water doesnt clean look little creek fee onto see quality water people use swim poolsthe one annoy thing people drive around early hour morning loud motorbike disturb everybody thats try sleep

Content: I suppose we were naive in assuming all beaches on Bali would be like a scene from South Pacific.Seminyak beach has rather dark sand, suffers from some rubbish and a constant tide, not of sea but of touts trying to sell stuff doggedly but unenthusiastically.Umbrellas and sunbeds cost about ¬£7 each but are more comfortable than trying to lay on a towel in a high wind.The sea has a lot of suspended sand as the shoreline is very shallow.Its always good to be by the sea, however, even when its impossible to find peace.One of the tourists on the sunbed next to me (which the attendant had already sold to three others before her) was having a massage from two locals plus another one trying to sell her a hat at the same time!If you are in Seminyak and like a beach there isn't much choice but you might be a little disapointed
review: suppose naive assume beach bali scene south pacificseminyak rather dark sand suffers rubbish constant tide sea tout try sell stuff doggedly unenthusiasticallyumbrellas sunbeds cost 7 comfortable try lay towel high windthe sea lot suspend sand shoreline shallowits always good sea even impossible find peaceone tourist sunbed next attendant already sell three others massage two local plus another one try sell hat timeif seminyak isnt much choice might little disapointed

Content: It's an amazing beach to go for a run/ walk. We tried little workouts here too. I practiced yoga independently.Watching the sunset as we walked was bliss.Very popular for surfers because of the huge waves!There's options to hire sun beds/ bean bags to watch the sunset. Loads of bars and places to eat along the beachside. Negative factors are;1. There's a lot of washed up rubbish on the sand so watch where you step! Especially broken glass pieces on some parts.2. You have to pay to park and visit the beach. I only put this as a negative factor as it was free in Phuket Thailand! (I know I shouldn't compare but costs can build up if you're visiting daily!)3. For me, crabs! That's because they freak me out! 4. People trying to sell you stuff - a generic issue worldwide whilst travelling!
review: amaze go run walk tried little workout practice yoga independentlywatching sunset walk blissvery popular surfer huge wavestheres option hire sun bed bean bag watch sunset load bar place eat along beachside negative factor are1 there lot wash rubbish sand watch step especially broken glass piece parts2 pay park visit put negative factor free phuket thailand know shouldnt compare cost build youre visit daily3 crab thats freak 4 people try sell stuff generic issue worldwide whilst travelling

Content: Beach is dirty! Don't go to Seminyak looking for nice beaches. They have litter on them, stray dogs, etc. Don't get the hype.
review: dirty dont go seminyak look nice beach litter stray dog etc dont hype

Content: One of my favourite spots to watch the sunset in Bali. It's always busy but I still love it! Love the vibe there!
review: one favourite spot watch sunset bali always busy still love love vibe

Content: We have been to Seminayak beach during our stay in Seminayak,Bali. Beach is clean from perspective of Solid dirt like Polythene etc. Sea water has much higher current than Kuta Beach. Number of people can be seen there doing surf.Best Thing: Branded eating outlets on beach like potato head, less crowded, good for walk.Beautiful pic background and scenes for sunset. Near to Tanha lot temple.Bad Thing: Sewer water for Seminayak drops in to sea so little messy in between. Overall worth spending time!!
review: seminayak stay seminayakbali clean perspective solid dirt polythene etc sea water much higher current kuta number people see surfbest thing brand eat outlet potato head less crowded good walkbeautiful pic background scene sunset near tanha lot templebad thing sewer water seminayak drop sea little messy overall worth spending time

Content: We went for a walk on the beach it's stunning at sunset! There is lots of sellers on the beach however just say no and keep walking unless you are interested lol
review: go walk stun sunset lots seller say keep walk unless interested lol

Content: Having said that the drainage system ruins a northerly walkRelax on the beach on day beds or sip a drink in one of the many bars whilst the kids enjoy the clean beach
review: say drainage system ruin northerly walkrelax day bed sip drink one many bar whilst kid enjoy clean

Content: Great spot, chairs & umbrellas to hire, as well as surfboards & boogie boards. Clean water, service on the beach for drinks & some but not too many hawkers
review: great spot chair umbrellas hire well surfboard boogie board clean water service drink many hawker

Content: Great spot to surf in the mornings and a very relaxed atmosphere. Always barter for surfboards and sun loungers. By the time we got the hang of it, we consistently paid IR100k for a lounger and surfboard for the ENTIRE day. In the beginning we paid that for an hour, etc. So just keep walking if they don't agree - you'll get your price. But do it respectfully.
review: great spot surf morning relax atmosphere always barter surfboard sun lounger time get hang consistently pay ir100k lounger surfboard entire day begin pay hour etc keep walk dont agree youll price respectfully

Content: Awesome place to hang out. Nice views good atmosphere enjoyed the beanbags rather than tables and chairs
review: awesome place hang nice view good atmosphere enjoy beanbags rather table chair

Content: Nice beach,not crowded as kuta beach and this beach more clean than kuta,many foreigner here especially western
review: nice beachnot crowd kuta clean kutamany foreigner especially western

Content: Beaches of bali are best in the world. There is zimbaran beach where you can go for the evening fun, there will be live shows and open restaurants where you can enjoy.
review: beach bali best world zimbaran go even fun will live show open restaurant enjoy

Content: You can rent a sun lounge and spend day lying by the beach. Many vendors try to sell you their wares but they don't hassle you if you tell them to leave. Many great venues line the shores so you can easily get a drink in the hot sun. Don't forget to always swim between the flags. Sometimes the waves can be dumpers. Overall a nice experience which would be recommended
review: rent sun lounge spend day lie many vendor try sell ware dont hassle tell leave many great venue line shore easily drink hot sun dont forget always swim flag sometimes wave dumper overall nice experience recommend

Content: Disappointing beaches in seminyak. Was definitely expecting more. Not white sandy and smooth! Be prepared to see A LOT of rubbish and dirt. Such a pity to see what could be beautiful totally abused and kinda smelly. Great sunsets and waves though!
review: disappointing beach seminyak definitely expect white sandy smooth prepare see lot rubbish dirt pity see beautiful totally abused kinda smelly great sunset wave though

Content: We went down to watch the sunset .Lovely time of night with lots of people around to watch. Seats, drinks, food also available along the beach.
review: go watch sunset lovely time night lot people around watch seat drink food available along

Content: Standing and viewing the endless beach stretching before you is breathtakingly awesome.  The sea rolls in with large breakers, which are perfect for the surfers and again, watching them battle against the elements is a sight that never ceases to amaze.  However, walk along the beach and there is rubbish strewn about.  In some places the beach is discoloured and you can see why from the effluence in the water.  I did not venture in it and I certainly was amazed that others let their children anywhere these obviously polluted parts.  It was a great disappointment and made me wish that I had chosen anywhere else in Bali other than Seminyak/Kota.  They would do well to organise parties of people to clean the beach each day and then it might be a safer and more beautiful attraction.
review: stand view endless stretch breathtakingly awesome sea roll large breaker perfect surfer watch battle element sight never cease amaze walk along rubbish strewn place discolour see effluence water venture certainly amaze others let child anywhere obviously polluted part great disappointment make wish chosen anywhere bali seminyakkota well organise party people clean day might safer beautiful attraction

Content: Perhaps living in Australia with its pristine beaches has spoiled us, but I wouldn't even walk on those carbage strewn places you don't know what's buried , there's no excuse for the dirt there, it is only slightly better than Kuta beach. Bali needs to sort its beaches out to bring them up to a family friendly status.
review: perhaps live australia pristine beach spoil u wouldnt even walk carbage strewn place dont know whats bury there excuse dirt slightly well kuta bali need sort beach bring family friendly status

Content: Great beachfront. Beach and water very clean. Sun beds from local vendors are ridiculously expensive and if you need one better go to one of the beach clubs where you get top service and a pool as well. The surf is amazing but equally dangerous. Do listen to the Lifeguards they know better than you do where it's safe to swim. In some places the current is scarily strong and can just pull you out to sea.
review: great beachfront water clean sun bed local vendor ridiculously expensive need one good go one club top service pool well surf amaze equally dangerous listen lifeguard know good safe swim place current scarily strong pull sea

Content: Rubbish everywhere and dirty water. I wouldn't swim in it. Better beaches definitely ! Otherwise Seminyak is great
review: rubbish everywhere dirty water wouldnt swim good beach definitely seminyak great

Content: A beautiful landscape of beach for public to enjoy... there are several beach club along the beach that will ensure you to enjoy your moment and relaxation
review: beautiful landscape public enjoy several club along will ensure enjoy moment relaxation

Content: This beach is really nice to look at. Unfortunately the tide works the wrong way here as the waves become stronger as the day passes. Get a beachclub with a pool and enjoy. But sitting on this beach is not an alternative.... there are better places to sit in the sand. After 16:00 you have the best sun set in the world.... so.... take it for what it is, not how it sounds.
review: really nice look unfortunately tide work wrong way wave become strong day pass beachclub pool enjoy sit alternative good place sit sand 1600 best sun set world take sound

Content: Went there a few times the beach is very big but the sea is a bit hard to swim. If you  like to swim or just chill in the water not the best beach for you. Care with the high prices for the sunbeds and the umbrellas.
review: go time big sea bit hard swim swim chill water best care high price sunbeds umbrellas

Content: Seminyak beach is quite beautiful and differs from Kuta in that is is cleaner and less crowded.  We walked down to Legian for our usual brunch and drink and enjoyed the peacefulness.  There are some great hotels that open up to the beach and generally you can go in to the cafes.  If in doubt, don't be put off by the security guard and ask them if you can go  in.  If you are approached by a hawker, simply say no thanks and keep walking, and they will not pursue you (as a rule). The beach at night is misty with the waves gently crashing on the beach, and I recommend you find a great restaurant that opens up to the beach for a beautiful evening of fine dining. If it is with someone you love, then all the better.
review: seminyak quite beautiful differs kuta clean less crowded walk legian usual brunch drink enjoy peacefulness great hotel open generally go cafes doubt dont put security guard ask go approach hawker simply say thanks keep walking will pursue rule night misty wave gently crash recommend find great restaurant open beautiful even fine din someone love well

Content: Very Clean beach with good sand and less number of tourists. Nice place to spend and enjoy a day.Near to bog and famour reaorts and villas.
review: clean good sand less number tourist nice place spend enjoy daynear bog famour reaorts villa

Content: Dirty beach.. not worth the traveling experience. It seems to be actually cleaner down in Legian and Kuta.. Rubish all through the sand..
review: dirty worth travel experience seem actually clean legian kuta rubish sand

Content: The beaches are long and sandy.  Large breaks to shore and easy to wade but not swimming for beginners.  Body surfer would love these shorebreaks and surfers the outside breaks.
review: beach long sandy large break shore easy wade swim beginner body surfer love shorebreaks surfer outside break

Content: This beach is raved about and I don't know why! It was so dirty on the beach and there was so much rubbish in the water. Most of the restaurants on the beach were quite run down. Lots of people offering you to buy different accessories/paintings/toys. This beach definitely needs a clean up! Will not revisit and would not recommend to others.
review: rave dont know dirty much rubbish water restaurant quite run lot people offer buy different accessoriespaintingstoys definitely needs clean will revisit recommend others

Content: The beach in Seminiak is not everywhere recommended for bathing. While visiting and walking along the beach I realized that in some places where the water is really dirty and I am not so sure that is not coming from sewages. Plus the huge waves are the delight of surfers not swimmers. If you visit with a small child make sure it stays far from the water due to waves and fast curents
review: seminiak everywhere recommend bath visit walk along realize place water really dirty sure come sewage plus huge wave delight surfer swimmer visit small child make sure stay far water due wave fast curents

Content: The sunset of course is legendary, but the place comes to life at night. With many beach chairs, bean lounges and music for all tastes. Nice way to spend an evening.
review: sunset course legendary place come life night many chair bean lounge music taste nice way spend even

Content: Love the seminyak beach, people around here very nice, we really enjoyed and not disturbing with people offering things. And the wave its very cool for played board. We spend all day relaxing on the beach.
review: love seminyak people around nice really enjoyed disturb people offer thing wave cool play board spend day relaxing

Content: If you are a surf lover, this is it...best and biggest wave you ever seen. Very nice long stretch beach for walking. A bit dirty with trash flow on top from where am at though.
review: surf lover itbest big wave see nice long stretch walk bit dirty trash flow top though

Content: Good location to busk in the beach atmosphere and watch the sunset.Great to see many locals with theirs dogs roaming along the beach together with all the tourists holidaying on this island.The sunset view was definitely worth making a trip there to enjoy it and some photo taking.
review: good location busk atmosphere watch sunsetgreat see many local dog roam along together tourist holiday islandthe sunset view definitely worth make trip enjoy photo take

Content: Perfect place to take a walk before it gets too hot out.  The water was so warm, the stray dogs were chilling and playing together, and the beach stretches out for miles.  I got a good walk in.  Perfect.

Content: The beach and the neighborhood was terrible, really overrated, not a very friendly neighborhood to walk at night. The beach wasn't clean at all.

Content: If you just want a chilled beach lined with resorts then this is your thing. There isn't really much of a path to go biking on, but you can walk on the path for a bit but it ends quite abruptly which is a bummer.

Content: The water has loads of seaweed and the tide goes in the afternoon. Go to another beach if you can. The sand is rough and the stones can hurt your feet

Content: Make sure there are plenty people eating in restaurants before you go in as its very quite here. We have been to 4 other restaurants in this are this trip and food was no problem.

Content: Beach is ok, however the breaks are so big you can't really go for a relaxing swim. Water Is quite shallow. Prepare for people trying to sell you things

Content: any beach in the pacific is nicier  dirty and ill kept . the beach at kuta is much tidier  and  big seas, however very crowded, with lots of people trying to sell you things.  darker sandy beaches at seminak  but not that flash
review: pacific nicier dirty ill keep kuta much tidy big sea crowd lots people try sell thing darker sandy beach seminak flash

Content: The beach itself is really poor, sometimes quite dirty and smelly but there are lots of bars crating a nice atmosphere. The only problem is that bars are really close to each other and if sitting outside you can ear loud music from different bars

Content: Bit smelly from the river a little further down flowing into the sea. Tourists are ruining it by littering without care and the lounge chairs are a little more expensive than Kuta beach.

Content: We visited  other beaches like nusa dua and another private one whose name I don't remember but this one was the best of all

Content: The beach is dirty and cant believe  people would swim here. There is rubbish  everwhere and the sand is like dirt

Content: Somewhat dirty and constantly hassled by Hawkers.I  would have liked to have seen the  sunset but weather precluded this. I doubt you would be left alone to enjoy the experience.
review: somewhat dirty constantly hassle hawkersi like see sunset weather preclude doubt leave alone enjoy experience

Content: Honestly do not even bother going there! I was appalled when I saw how nasty this beach is. I mean Bali does not have nice beaches at all unless you are a surfer but this one is one of the worst. It just looks like you are at Brighton beach , NYC. The water is black, the sand is black with litter everywhere, the lounge chairs are 100 years old and vendors haggle you for a pedicure or a sarong every 5 minute! I had to leave to go to Kuta beach which is also disgusting. Bali is definitely NOT the place to go if you want turquoise water and white sand beaches!

Content: Lots of people around but does have a very nice sunset. A lot of restaurants or party cafe by the beach so access to the beach can be not so straight forward. We happened to be having dinner at Potato Head Beach Resort.
review: lot people around nice sunset lot restaurant party cafe access straight forward happen dinner potato head resort

Content: Compared to Kuta Beach which you might be strolling with huge amount of tourists, Seminyak beach is so much better and cleaner. There are restaurants along the beach.
review: compare kuta might stroll huge amount tourist seminyak much good cleaner restaurant along

Content: It was my first time visiting this beach. After only visiting Kuta beach, Seminyak beach is just amazing!!!!! We arrived at 11am and it was so quiet. No where as busy as Kuta Beach. My daughter even got her hair done and nails painted. I found we weren't hassled as much as we have been at Kuta beach, The beach was very clean and pretty. We will definitely be back to Seminyak
review: first time visit visit kuta seminyak amaze arrive 11am quiet busy kuta daughter even get hair do nail paint find werent hassle much kuta clean pretty will definitely back seminyak

Content: After hearing some not so pleasant things about Kuta beach, I can't say how happy we were to be close to Seminyak Beach. Very clean, and lots of little spots to chuck a towel down if you want to pay $70,000+ for beach-chairs.
review: hear pleasant thing kuta cant say happy close seminyak clean lot little spots chuck towel want pay 70000 beachchairs

Content: What a beach! We were coming here every day for about 5 last days in a row! Beach boys are always ready to talk nad make for you some great price for the beach chair or Surf rent... And it was not so crowded as Kuta... much more less sellers of sarongs and pedicure services! Surfing was great! And absolutely amazing sunsets with nice cold beer or cocktail on the soft chair with lounge music! Loved this place!
review: come every day 5 last day row boys always ready talk nad make great price chair surf rent crowd kuta much less seller sarongs pedicure service surf great absolutely amaze sunset nice cold beer cocktail soft chair lounge music love place

Content: good for surfing, i'm a beginner but met profi there too, also clean, but not that good for swimming, view is perfect! sunsets are very nice
review: good surf im beginner meet profi clean good swimming view perfect sunset nice

Content: Was a nice beach to go for a swim and get a cold beer and watch the sun set but i dont rate the beaches as good as the ones we have in Australia.Local people are fantastic and always willing to help out.
review: nice go swim cold beer watch sun set dont rate beach good one australialocal people fantastic always willing help

Content: Get down early to enjoy a cocktail whilst watching the sunset. There are a few bars where bands play live music. Not too many hawkers either.
review: early enjoy cocktail whilst watch sunset bar band play live music many hawker either

Content: Seminyak beach was OK fairly clean and not as crowded as Kuta, unfortunately  we found the hawkers on the whole to be pushy and quite rude on the day we visited which is always a disappointment in a destination known for its friendly and happy people, in fairness it is hard to make a positive comment on Balinese beaches in comparison to our beaches at home but overall was not blown away but at the same time not sorry we took the time to have a look.
review: seminyak ok fairly clean crowd kuta unfortunately find hawker whole pushy quite rude day visit always disappointment destination know friendly happy people fairness hard make positive comment balinese beach comparison beach home overall blow away time sorry take time look

Content: I love this long beach for morning walks and lazing at the bean bag bars  to watch the sunset- truly magical. The kids love the beach for it's nighttime entertainment- hawkers selling glow toys, art work, massages, sarongs and the beautiful coloured candle lanterns that are released after sunset.What I dislike immensely is all the rubbish both washed up and left higher on the sand.On my 1/2 hour morning walk yesterday I passed copious plastic bags, 2 used disposable nappies, 2 tubes of toothpaste, plastic water bottles etc. It is not a prisptine beach, it has  streams of foul water running into it and although they do clean the beach in the mornings it is still polluted. I don't swim there and my kids, who swallow sea water like seals, are not allowed in either- pools are a safer option.
review: love long morning walk laze bean bag bar watch sunset truly magical kid love nighttime entertainment hawker sell glow toy art work massage sarong beautiful colour candle lantern release sunsetwhat dislike immensely rubbish wash leave high sandon 12 hour morning walk yesterday pass copious plastic bag 2 use disposable nappy 2 tube toothpaste plastic water bottle etc prisptine stream foul water run although clean morning still pollute dont swim kid swallow sea water seal allow either pool safer option

Content: Seminyak has got to be the busiest and most exciting beach resort destination in Asia! Although no longer a quiet little fishing village (which I expect some people lament) it now has something for everyone, all ages, and surprises everywhere to keep you entertained and on your toes!Highly recommend grabbing a bean bag on the beach at dusk and trying some of the local cocktails ;) Selfie stick not necessary!
review: seminyak get busy excite resort destination asia although long quiet little fishing village expect people lament now something everyone age surprise everywhere keep entertain toeshighly recommend grab bean bag dusk try local cocktail selfie stick necessary

Content: Am I missing something here? We are staying in the middle of Seminyak so a trip to the beach was a must do. Went to the Mosaic Beach club (which is quite okay) but very disappointed in the beach and can't recognise what I saw in some of the reviews! Hot, grey, coarse sand, ungroomed beach access points, strong tides (and I can swim well) and sewage outlets so a walk along the beach is an obstacle course. I like lots of things about Bali but give me Aussie beaches anytime, rather than Seminyak, although I will go back to enjoy the Sunset!
review: miss something stay middle seminyak trip must go mosaic club quite okay disappointed cant recognise saw review hot grey coarse sand ungroomed access point strong tide swim well sewage outlet walk along obstacle course lots thing bali give aussie beach anytime rather seminyak although will go back enjoy sunset

Content: Great beach day and night.  Take a walk grab a drink and chat to the locals at one of the many beach bar set ups all the way to Kuta.  The restaurants and vendors at night are awesome.  Let the kids buy a night lantern and let it go over the beach for a great memory.  Very safe and a lot of fun,
review: great day night take walk grab drink chat locals one many bar set ups way kuta restaurant vendor night awesome let kid buy night lantern let go great memory safe lot fun

Content: Loved this beach, so much to do.Endless subbed options that will bring you food and ice cold drinks, ice cream.Board hire or learn to surf.Swimming flags to keep you safe.Waves can get quite big and undertow very strong as well.
review: love much doendless sub option will bring food ice cold drink ice creamboard hire learn surfswimming flag keep safewaves quite big undertow strong well

Content: Seminyak is one of the beach that you would like to visit if you prefer a quiet place to admire the waves. It has alot of restaurants along the beach with beanbags for your relaxation. Live Bands are there to provide the music with the waves. It was a good place to relax and watch the sunset. Definitely a place to visit if you seek a different feeling compared to Kuta beach.
review: seminyak one visit prefer quiet place admire wave alot restaurant along beanbags relaxation live band provide music wave good place relax watch sunset definitely place visit seek different feeling compare kuta

Content: I walk down in the early morning and while this might look ok at night it's just very ordinary in the daylight. I hate nothing more in Bali than seeing signs for COLD PISS. Don't bother
review: walk early morning might look ok night ordinary daylight hate nothing bali see sign cold piss dont bother

Content: Very dirty beach. There are also a few sewer outlets running into ocean. Would never use it. Rubish strewn all over the sand. Black sand.

Content: Nice to look at at the different times of day and tides. Dig dumping waves often. Someone drowned one night when we were there.Black sand, very clingy. Tractors drive around each morning. And people ride horses - watch out!  Not a good beach.
review: nice look different time day tide dig dump wave often someone drown one night thereblack sand clingy tractor drive around morning people ride horse watch good

Content: Dirty when low tide. We preferred swimming in the property pool. Though it's perfect for sun bathing.
review: dirty low tide preferred swim property pool though perfect sun bathing

Content: We are from QLD so we are spoilt where beaches are concerned.  There was lots of rubbish and brown sand, waves were too big to swim.  Unfortunately most of Bali that we saw, didnt have nice beaches but that doesnt matter when you have beautiful pools!
review: qld spoilt beach concerned lot rubbish brown sand wave big swim unfortunately bali saw didnt nice beach doesnt matter beautiful pool

Content: Warning...please be careful when using the money changers in the few shops outside the Ku De Ta. they are called the Big Boss money change and they ripped us off for RP700,00 approx ¬£30 even though I counted the money 4 times, they still managed the slip notes out. They bambosle you with RP50,000 notes and try to distract you. I know ¬£30 is not a lot but when you are on a budget that can be 3 meals. Made me very distrustful of people and ruined Seminyak for me. Beach lovely but vendors renting sunbeds also tried ripping us off asking for RP200,00 for 2 hours, rather sit on the sand. In sanur, sunbeds RP40,000 - RP50,000 for all day. Even though we stayed in Seminyak we ventured into Kuta which we preferred in the long run
review: warningplease careful use money changer shop outside ku de ta call big bos money change rip u rp70000 approx 30 even though count money 4 time still manage slip note bambosle rp50000 note try distract know 30 lot budget 3 meal make distrustful people ruin seminyak lovely vendor rent sunbeds try rip u ask rp20000 2 hour rather sit sand sanur sunbeds rp40000 rp50000 day even though stayed seminyak venture kuta prefer long run

Content: Not much more to do in Seminyak then lying on the beach and go shopping < although there are some original (clothing) shops there, do expect to see a lot of Aussi surf brands there too ...Found little of Indonesian/ Bali culture left ....Very 'touristic' and the streets are quite busy during 6-10 in the evening.Many street sellers, taxis/ cars, beach sellers and a general over-population ...Maybe this is a 'natural' development, and me being part of it should not complain so much, but nevertheless I found the visit a bit .... disappointing ... and probably will not return there.If you do go, make sure to visit restaurant Sate Bali, so at least you get some beautiful & tasty 'Bali food'!http://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g469404-d1182566-Reviews-Sate_Bali-Seminyak_Bali.html
review: much seminyak lie go shop although original clothing shop expect see lot aussi surf brand find little indonesian bali culture leave touristic street quite busy 610 eveningmany street seller taxis car seller general overpopulation maybe natural development part complain much nevertheless find visit bit disappointing probably will return thereif go make sure visit restaurant sate bali least beautiful tasty bali foodhttpwwwtripadvisorcomrestaurant_reviewg469404d1182566reviewssate_baliseminyak_balihtml

Content: As a natural Beach you will have to travel far to find something as pristine as this. however depending on the time of the year it can be really busy. most annoying are the "Traders". it is a continious pattern of trying to sell you something. From Kites to Watches.
review: natural will travel far find something pristine depending time year really busy annoy trader continious pattern try sell something kite watch

Content: I decided to walk on the beach towards Legian.  A guy asked if I wanted a chair however I found several ladies all wanted to provide their services.  I didn't really approve however they were so persistent so I let them & paid them.  Apart from this the beach was very quiet.Ellie
review: decide walk towards legian guy ask wanted chair find several lady want provide service didnt really approve persistent let pay apart quietellie

Content: Along Seminyak beach, there are cafes and bars which serving a variety of cocktails, local and Western food.Cafes are packed since evening, they place bean bags on the beach with music bands playing cool reggae.What a wonderful time, having dinner on the beach!
review: along seminyak cafe bar serve variety cocktail local western foodcafes pack evening place bean bag music band play cool reggaewhat wonderful time dinner

Content: great place to swim, not big waves to learn to surf, cheap drinks on the beach, have to haggle on price for lounges, if you don't mind being pesters by hawkers, nice and relaxing.
review: great place swim big wave learn surf cheap drink haggle price lounge dont mind pesters hawker nice relax

Content: The beach stretches for kms in both directions and is dotted with small bars and restaurants and warungs. Surfing is everywhere although there are lots of rips so take care. The sand is hard and great for walking. It's also a great place to watch the sunset
review: stretch kms direction dot small bar restaurant warungs surf everywhere although lots rip take care sand hard great walk great place watch sunset

Content: having afternoon snack while waiting for sunset here. the view was pretty amazing. and it's not too crowd for enjoyable sunset-time.
review: afternoon snack wait sunset view pretty amaze crowd enjoyable sunsettime

Content: This seems like a great area of the beach, if you can embrace the hawkers, or at least not have them detract from your experience.The bars along the beach are well set-up to cater for those wanting a drink or a meal, with comfy bean-bags and umbrellas.First thing in the morning is great for running along the beach, with packed sand from the tide.
review: seem great area embrace hawker least detract experiencethe bar along well setup cater want drink meal comfy beanbag umbrellasfirst thing morning great run along pack sand tide

Content: We were delivered to the beach by golf cart from our hotel.  The sand is grey and gritty.  The number of people on the beach reflected the state of tourism currently in Bali - it was practically deserted.  There were the usual annoying hawkers but a couple of acceptable beach cafes.  The surf today (23/04/2015) was poor though a few diehards were out.  Not a very inspiring place.
review: deliver golf cart hotel sand grey gritty number people reflect state tourism currently bali practically desert usual annoying hawker couple acceptable cafe surf today 23042015 poor though diehard inspire place

Content: Stunning tidal beach offering something for everyone from top surfers, to belly boarders, to walking through shallows, good for kids, ideal for veryone.
review: stun tidal offering something everyone top surfer belly boarder walk shallow good kid ideal veryone

Content: The beach here is a bit grotty but head for the shacks and enjoy a beer or cocktail watching the sunsetPlenty of hawkers but they will keep walking with a firm "no thanks"Great surfI thought Kuta beach better for a day out
review: bit grotty head shack enjoy beer cocktail watch sunsetplenty hawker will keep walking firm thanksgreat surfi think kuta well day

Content: We were there at low tide and found it an unattractive beach. It is interesting to watch the surfers if the surf is up.
review: low tide find unattractive interesting watch surfer surf

Content: the beach is becoming more and more dirty. Atmosphere is not what it used to be. I don't go there anymore.

Content: The dirty beach in colour and with rubbish as well as filthy deck chairs, although the little bars sell cold bitang beer and are cheaper than in town
review: dirty colour rubbish well filthy deck chair although little bar sell cold bitang beer cheap town

Content: This probably isn't a well warranted review, based on experience, but here goes!  We walked to Seminyak Beach from our villa in the Jalan Kunti 1 area (near to Bali Deli), the first night we arrived to Bali.  We've been here a month - give or take - and I have not returned.  Early evening, and it's about a 20 minute, winding walk through the streets of Grosinyak to get there.  We arrive to find, not so much a beach, but more akin to a newly started landfill.  Plastic, garbage, washed up debris of all sorts, littering the beach and floating in the water.  Not exactly a Kodak moment!  And yet - swimmers, surfers and sun worshipers galore!  I guess it's that "when in Rome" mentality?  (I'd rather just go to Rome!)  Oh wait!  I lie!  We did walk the beach a second time during a pouring rain storm, which was a million times better as there were only a handful of folks around, and clean-up crews were hard at work which was great to see, but limited to the beach-fronts of the fancy hotels.  My concern on that day - what the hell is hiding in that grey water that flows from the klongs - directly in to the sea???  Shameful!
review: probably isnt well warrant review base experience go walk seminyak villa jalan kunti 1 area near bali deli first night arrive bali weve month give take return early even 20 minute wind walk street grosinyak arrive find much akin newly start landfill plastic garbage wash debris sort litter float water exactly kodak moment yet swimmers surfer sun worshiper galore guess rome mentality id rather go rome oh wait lie walk second time pour rain storm million time well handful folk around cleanup crew hard work great see limited beachfront fancy hotel concern day hell hide grey water flow klongs directly sea shameful

Content: People were swimming in this not very clean, black sandy beach but I'd prefer not too. there are dangerous rips and undertows as well - better swimming elsewhere.

Content: So if you like strolling on the beach at sunset, or enjoying extended beachside lunches, Seminayak is the place to be. The beach is wide and the surf is good if you have the skills. Swimmers are advised to only swim between the red and yellow flags, not where there are red flags, due to the rips or large waves. There is a good choice of beach bars, clubs and restaurants for day or night-time entertainment. Good for people watching. Can be windy though.
review: stroll sunset enjoy extend beachside lunch seminayak place wide surf good skill swimmer advise swim red yellow flag red flag due rip large wave good choice bar clubs restaurant day nighttime entertainment good people watch windy though

Content: Clean and neat beach with restaurants all around. Amazing sunset and view. Having dinner on the beach was an incredible experience.
review: clean neat restaurant around amazing sunset view dinner incredible experience

Content: Visited this beach during sunset. Nice beach to spend some time in the evening. There is live music, it wasn‚Äôt much crowed.
review: visit sunset nice spend time even live music wasnt much crowed

Content: The beach is crowded and a little dirty here. Don't leave items unattended. The hotels along the beach take care os their own beachfront - pay a little more to stay in one of these.
review: crowd little dirty dont leave item unattended hotel along take care os beachfront pay little stay one

Content: We went out on a glass bottom boat to the reef. There is some live reef, but the water is murky and viewing very limited and fish life disappointing. The beaches are covered in litter at low tide. Next time ill just spend more time by the pool at the villa!
review: go glass bottom boat reef live reef water murky view limited fish life disappointing beach cover litter low tide next time ill spend time pool villa

Content: Nothing much offered here. Signed up for water sports package which cost about US$28 consisting of parasailing, jetski and banana boat. They rushed you to do the activities and then done. Intended to relax but was disappointed at the mad rush through the activities. Not worth it. Dont bother unless you have never seen a beach.
review: nothing much offer signed water sport package cost us28 consist parasailing jetski banana boat rush activity do intend relax disappointed mad rush activity worth dont bother unless never see

Content: I just stopped by here on my way to Tanah Lot and found it to be a decent beach. It was a little dirty, but that was due to the storm that came through the night before. Other than that, i found some nice shells there. i did have to avoid a couple folks trying to sell me things, but other than that it was ok. Next time I would like to spend a little more time there and check out the area.
review: stop way tanah lot find decent little dirty due storm come night find nice shell avoid couple folk try sell thing ok next time spend little time check area

Content: Beach wasnt clean! Syringes found in front of us on Westin area of beach!  So many petrol watersports, there was a 'film' of fuel on the surface.  Wouldn't swim there!
review: wasnt clean syrinx find front u westin area many petrol watersports film fuel surface wouldnt swim

Content: Nice stretch of sand.  Too bad it faces east so we could not get the sunsets over water.  Not busy like Jimbaran Bay.
review: nice stretch sand bad face east sunset water busy jimbaran bay

Content: Nice place to stay if you wanna watch the sunset, people go here to surf too. We stayed at a beach front restaurant so we could watch the sunset without the hassle of where to stay.One downside is going and leaving here. There is a local conflict between Grab/GoJek/BlueBird and local taxis here. It is kinda traumatizing since we already booked a grab, and we were already inside the car when a guy in a motorcycle followed us and forced us to go down. Apparently, grab is not allowed in that area. It was scary since it‚Äôs in the middle of the night, we were forced to walk to our hotel, and the streets are already dark. No cars/scooters were passing. The guy in a motorcycle was harassing the grab and kept shouting (we dont know the language coz they spoke indonesian).We are tourists so we dont know where to get a taxi (since there are no taxi around) so Grab is the most convenient way, yet somehow, some of the locals cant understand that. Also, if you choose the option to ride them, it is freaking expensive compared to taxi and grab considering the distance is only 1-2km away. They will charge you for as much as 150k. None of us also know how to drive a scooter so we cant rent one (most of the tourist here rent a scooter to go to places since it‚Äôs a lot cheaper, cars could be really expensive here)To the local government of Bali, please fix this. We were two girls traveling that time so imagine how scared we were.
review: nice place stay wanna watch sunset people go surf stay front restaurant watch sunset without hassle stayone downside go leave local conflict grabgojekbluebird local taxi kinda traumatize already book grab already inside car guy motorcycle follow u force u go apparently grab allow area scary middle night force walk hotel street already dark carsscooters pass guy motorcycle harass grab keep shout dont know language coz speak indonesianwe tourist dont know taxi taxi around grab convenient way yet somehow local cant understand choose option ride freak expensive compare taxi grab consider distance 12km away will charge much 150k none u know drive scooter cant rent one tourist rent scooter go place lot cheap car really expensive hereto local government bali please fix two girl travel time imagine scar

Content: We made a quick visit this visit as the weather wasn't on our side.  The beach was great, but the water was a little dirty.  We don't swim, but felt it wasn't worth putting our feet in this time.

Content: A must see if your in this part of the world. Absolutely stunning. The road to get there is terrible. Take plenty of water.
review: must see part world absolutely stun road terrible take plenty water

Content: The visit was crowded with the arrived fast tourist, so to get a selfie was at your peril..but the coast is outstanding..the roads were rough...You need to be fit and with appropriate climbing footware, its quite dangerous if your not use to climbing but there is a firm rail..I wonder whether the locals are happy with the  amount of traffic and convoys of white transporter taking up the road..with the cost is unrealistic,for a single traveller i paid 1,500 000 or 1,100000 for a couple this included broken rock, angel b and crystal and all trsnsfer..only 50,000 really!! Not a water include..i feel the boat companies are taking a huge cut and there appears to be not money going into the island resources like inproving the roads..i see locals looking annoyed.I would just get a fast boat there and just spend all day at crystal beach..until the last fast boat back..4:30 and 5:30 depends on boat company.I wouldnt be racing back there in any hurry..

Content: We stopped at Kelingking Beach as the second place in our tour of Nusa Penida. We were not able to walk down to the beach due to our busy schedule, but the views from the top are stunning. A must-see if you are in Nusa Penida.
review: stop kelingking second place tour nusa penida able walk due busy schedule view top stun mustsee nusa penida

Content: Our hotel faced the beach in Seminyak, the beach can be walked on for many ks either way , i e from the airport beach to Changu and looks like one is in paradise.Sand is black , a change to what most of us are used to , surf is spectacular , but dangerous to the inexperienced swimmers.Unfortunately like most beaches in Bali , there is a massive problem with litter and rubbish , the main culprit being plastic of all descriptions , both in the water and on the beach.We encourage people visiting the beach to bring back a plastic bag full of rubbish each time they visit to not only assist with the litter problem , but also to encouragr locals to clean their beaches for themselves and the environment (N B we are not Greenies )
review: hotel face seminyak walk many k either way e airport changu look one paradisesand black change u use surf spectacular dangerous inexperienced swimmersunfortunately beach bali massive problem litter rubbish main culprit plastic description water beachwe encourage people visit bring back plastic bag full rubbish time visit assist litter problem encouragr local clean beach environment n b greenies

Content: do not buy and drink the cocktails as the will make u very sick.Its Bali moonshine they use.. it smells like fuel They told me its made from coconuts... no its not.It can be dangerous if ur on medication.The restaurants also offer these cocktails.Stay away from them.

Content: The beach in Seminyak is not as wide as in other areas of Bali but it is fairly clean and also perfect for a stroll. Compared to Kuta it is also cleaner. Not many people are in the water though.The best part are the sunsets which are simply stunning viewed from Seminyak. Best is to go to one of the beach clubs and enjoy the view from there.
review: seminyak wide area bali fairly clean perfect stroll compare kuta cleaner many people water thoughthe best part sunset simply stun view seminyak best go one club enjoy view

Content: This beach is a good place for strolling. Neat and clean beach. The weather was good in March when we visited there.overall a nice place for peaceful strolling.
review: good place stroll neat clean weather good march visit thereoverall nice place peaceful strolling

Content: Seminyak is that little bit quieter than Legian and definitely quieter than Kuta. Mostly high-end resorts so not a lot happening on the beachfront. Most of the resorts have restaurants/bars open to the public, including the excellent The Samaya, so it's well worth a drink or a meal looking over Seminyak Beach. Ok for surfing but the banks never quite form properly so it's hard to find a consistent peak. The quality of the water is hit and miss, use your sense. If it's been raining a lot and there's a lot of storm-water run-off or, (especially) you can see plastic bags, etc. in the water then stay out pf the water for a few days.

Content: Although this beach is nicer than the beach in Kuta which has litter everywhere, it's hardly clean and I definitely wouldn't describe it as a beautiful beach with white sand as it is often advertised. The water is quite shallow and the beach is wider than many. I wouldn't stay in Seminyak if I was after a beach holiday, but it's ok for a day maybe. Uluwatu is a better place to stay if you want a nice beach holiday.
review: although nice kuta litter everywhere hardly clean definitely wouldnt describe beautiful white sand often advertised water quite shallow wider many wouldnt stay seminyak holiday ok day maybe uluwatu good place stay want nice holiday

Content: The beach is fine. The further north u head the less hawkers and people on the beach. There are still chairs and umbrellas to hire and cheap beers to buy

Content: Beach is unfortunately not so nice anymore, lots of plastic and stuff. Surfing is ok still, but the beach is not for swimming due to waves and currents. Beach side hotels and restaurants are not especially nice either; more pricey the just a block above and the value for the extra sea view is overrated. Content: Dirty, dirt grey sand. Took a walk along the beach but didn¬¥t even bother to check the water temperature. Construction work along big parts of the beach. There is a few places where you can rent surf boards and sun beds. Canggu is where you go to eat good food, and surf.

Content: We have visited Seminyak beach and were really horrified by how dirty it is and the amount of plastic all over the beach. It‚Äôs so upsetting to see piles of plastic all over the shore. I just wanted to pick it all up, but there is so much everywhere  it would not have made a difference. There are some lovely bars to watch the sunset from, however the view is ruined by the amount of plastic everywhere all around you.We didn‚Äôt ever see anyone cleaning up the plastic at any point. We have seen many beautiful clean beaches in other parts of the world so this was a real shock. I would not visit this beach whilst it is in this mess.Something seriously needs to be done about this situation and the poor environment :(

Content: Seminyak Beach was probably beautiful once.  But not anymore.  An early morning walk will reveal the beach and waters edge completely...yes completely...covered in plastic trash debris.  The poor labourers from beachfront posh hotels and the odd restaurant try valiantly to rake up this rubbish before the punters arrive expecting clean sand.  It is thoroughly depressing. An environmental catastrophy.  The walk behind the beachside cafes stinks and is full of litter.  As always the Balinese people are friendly and upbeat but how long can we all go on pretending this place is anything other than a polluted and ruined once-was-paradise.

Content: This is one of the most disgustingly dirty beaches I have ever seen and I have travelled. The amount of rubbish washed up on the beach and not cleared away is a disgrace and an example of the crisis our oceans are suffering.  Why anyone would want to come and sit on it and look out at the rubbish is beyond me and why any Aussie would come from the beautiful beaches in Australia to surf here is crazy.  I went for an early morning run and had to wash my trainers after because I ran through the streams that led into the sea, the smell was so bad, god knows what is in that water and now in the sea.

review: filthy cover rubbish stray dog place lot dog poop weather wasnt particularly good either overall cleanliness leave lot desire

Content: Beach is rather dirty but since we have come back it has improved a fair bit and they are doing dinners and drinks along the beach, more festive to go at night
review: rather dirty come back improve fair bit dinner drink along festive go night

Content: I love swimming on this beach in the morning, when there are still less people there... This beach has a nice wave and many surfers like it too. Seminyak beach is one of the best places to see sunset in Bali so no wonder if this place is always full around that time...
review: love swim morning still less people nice wave many surfer seminyak one best place see sunset bali wonder place always full around time

Content: Cleanliness is an issue here. The sunset was good although it is not a white sandy beach but can always try to end a day here renting a sand bag sipping some mocktails and ice-cream with the kid.
review: cleanliness issue sunset good although white sandy always try end day rent sand bag sip mocktails icecream kid

Content: Beach itself is relatively clean, with a nice view. On super hot days there was an oder - I suspect from the rubbish behind the restaurants along the beach front. It was quite unpleasant and we could not stay long. Would recommend going at sunset/night as it's a bit cooler and the lanterns that are put up make for a very nice view.
review: relatively clean nice view super hot day oder suspect rubbish behind restaurant along front quite unpleasant stay long recommend go sunsetnight bit cool lanterns put make nice view

Content: This beach was beautiful and jam packed with restaurants and activities.The Unfortunate Issue was Rubbish every where
review: beautiful jam pack restaurant activitiesthe unfortunate issue rubbish every

Content: There's a sign before the beach letting us know it's "garbage season" at seminyak beach from December to April. It wasn't swimmable when we went, there was so much garbage floating around. I would give it a miss during this time of year, there are much nicer beaches around Bali to enjoy.
review: there sign let u know garbage season seminyak december april wasnt swimmable go much garbage float around give miss time year much nicer beach around bali enjoy

Content: We were here in March 2017 and the beach was quite clean. We were lucky to be staying at Alila with an Ocean view room so it was great waking up to see locals and tourist having morning walks and having fun. From Alila, we walked along the beach front to Kuta which didn't take long (prob shorter than a taxi ride!) and we also walked in the opposite direction towards Canggu. On our walks we discovered a few local bars (no hype type...) on beach front, so take some Rp with you for a quick stop and support the locals.
review: march 2017 quite clean lucky stay alila ocean view room great wake see local tourist morning walk fun alila walk along front kuta didnt take long prob shorter taxi ride walk opposite direction towards canggu walk discover local bar hype type front take rp quick stop support local

Content: We would rock up at this beach at the end of a long hot day, and just grab a bean bag in one of the many beach bars and watch the sunset. It's a beautiful setting and so relaxing. The one issue is in some parts there is some mess and waste, this could easily be cleaned up by the local government each night.
review: rock end long hot day grab bean bag one many bar watch sunset beautiful set relax one issue part mess waste easily clean local government night

Content: A must visit beach for everyone coming to Bali. It's peaceful and the night life is also good here. Enjoy a romantic stroll or just sip a beer while sitting on the bean bags, this beach will surely give you some good memories.
review: must visit everyone come bali peaceful night life good enjoy romantic stroll sip beer sit bean bag will surely give good memory

Content: I have travelled for many years and can honestly say l have never seen so much rubbish on a beach. even when you enter the water you are walking in floating plastic and any other form of garbage. The locals are only interested in selling you over priced drinks, or renting you a board for 4 times the price you would pay 5 mins walk away to a side street shop. They are not interested in your comfort if you don't want to lie on the dirty beaches of kuta ,legion or Seminyak you can rent an over priced sun bed.
review: travel many year honestly say l never see much rubbish even enter water walk float plastic form garbage local interested selling price drink rent board 4 time price pay 5 min walk away side street shop interested comfort dont want lie dirty beach kuta legion seminyak rent price sun bed

Content: Seminyak beach are the clean and beautiful view beach,there also is a good place for surfing. Nearby have a lot great restaurant.
review: seminyak clean beautiful view beachthere good place surf nearby lot great restaurant

Content: Beach is not as clean but the sunsets are perfect and not crowded like the ones in Kuta. Stop off at ku da tah. Potato head or the Alila for drinks
review: clean sunset perfect crowd one kuta stop ku da tah potato head alila drink

Content: Pretty good place to chill at sunset and to eat in the evening with lots of restos lining up the beach till Double Six. With their nice colourful umbrellas, it's quite a sight.
review: pretty good place chill sunset eat even lot restos line till double six nice colourful umbrellas quite sight

Content: For me the ocean always had a soothing effect on my mood. At Seminyak beach, you have endless stretches of beach for your toes to hug. If surfing is your thing, then the long breakers will be the stuff that dreams are made off.
review: ocean always soothe effect mood seminyak endless stretch toe hug surf thing long breaker will stuff dream make

Content: Our hotel was a few mins walk from Seminyak beach.... It's wide and waves are huge .... You get a variety of bars and restaurants to choose from.... It's nicer and calmer than Kuta Beach ....In the evenings there were loads of lanterns lights lit up and big bonfire in front of some restaurants.... Lovely atmosphere...Nice stroll and amazing sunset as it's anywhere else in Bali ....You watch people riding horses or walking , surfing .... We didn't dare to go in to the sea as it looked very scary and waves were big .... But beautiful all the same .... If you keep walking then you reach the much busier Kuta beach ... More going on there .... The reason for a 4 star rating is the sewerage smell and the rubbish .... Probably coming from the hotels we don't know ... Bali and its beaches are definitely worth a visit...
review: hotel min walk seminyak wide wave huge variety bar restaurant choose nice calmer kuta evening load lantern light light big bonfire front restaurant lovely atmospherenice stroll amaze sunset anywhere bali watch people rid horse walk surf didnt dare go sea look scary wave big beautiful keep walk reach much busy kuta go reason 4 star rating sewerage smell rubbish probably come hotel dont know bali beach definitely worth visit

Content: The first night we went there was great buzz on the beach. A few nights later it was weird. And if you're looking for snow white sand forget it.  There are enough restaurants and bars to find something to keep most people happy.
review: first night go great buzz night later weird youre look snow white sand forget enough restaurant bar find something keep people happy

Content: Compared to the beaches in Uluwatu, seminyak is not that great but it still is a good enough place to go in case you have nothing to do.
review: compare beach uluwatu seminyak great still good enough place go case nothing

Content: Beach isn't very well maintained. There were lot of weeds in the area. However the sea is shallow here and that was a totally different experience.
review: isnt well maintain lot weed area sea shallow totally different experience

Content: Beach is more for watersport only. The shore is piled with rubbish and oil slicks. Sadly the neighbouring resorts do not bother much to do something about it. Nusa Dua is like a private area but the beach is being left alot to desire for.
review: watersport shore pile rubbish oil slick sadly neighbour resort bother much something nusa dua private area leave alot desire

Content: Don't you ever come to Bali if looking for beautiful beaches. Crowded from vendors annoying you all day long, full of rubbish, dirty with brownish water. Extremely overpriced.
review: dont come bali look beautiful beach crowd vendor annoy day long full rubbish dirty brownish water extremely overprice

Content: Husband and I took a stroll on this beach today. The water was warm enough to be considered bath water. The waves were incredible. If I were surfer I would have been stoked, dude. Totally stoked. We also stopped off at Ku De Ta for a slushy (we both got watermelon, but I had to add simple syrup to mine because it was toooo sour). We watched two senior citizens battle the current, only up to their knees in the water. I seriously feared for their lives as I watched them almost get sucked out with the current. I'm pretty sure this isn't a place for swimming on account of those currents and those monster waves, but it sure is pretty. Worth a walk. The only downside is the depressing garbage that washes up with the waves ... plastic bags, bottles, yogurt cups (I had no idea so many peopled liked yogurt), and weird things I couldn't identify. I feel sorry for the fish around Bali.
review: husband take stroll today water warm enough consider bath water wave incredible surfer stoke dude totally stoked stop ku de ta slushy get watermelon add simple syrup mine toooo sour watch two senior citizen battle current knee water seriously fear life watch almost suck current im pretty sure isnt place swim account current monster wave sure pretty worth walk downside depress garbage wash wave plastic bag bottle yogurt cup idea many people liked yogurt weird thing couldnt identify feel sorry fish around bali

Content: The place was covered with rubbish. Enough said i think. So much for a romantic walk if you are tripping over empty bottles. OK it must be the tourists, but it's up to the authorities to tidy up. There are a lot of bars along, nothing special. If you sit on the beach prepare to be nagged every 2min by somebody selling selfie sticks or some dubious paintings. Did not meet the expectation one bit.
review: place cover rubbish enough say think much romantic walk trip empty bottle ok must tourists authority tidy lot bar along nothing special sit prepare nag every 2min somebody sell selfie stick dubious painting meet expectation one bit

Content: This stretch of beach could be beautiful but it's not. I went back today when it was just off high tide to see if it was any better than when we were there at low tide. But no luck, it is still dirty and polluted. What a shame. The sand when wet resembles mud and sticks like paste to everything (not like most sand, which sticks but will brush off). I know the locals have to make a living but there are so many people trying to sell you things, which is fine when walking through but I imagine it could get a little annoying if you decided to sit in the beach.I saw and heard many people complaining of skin rashes and sores after the beach and swimming in the ocean.Hopefully Bali can get a plan together to reduce the water and beach pollution and increase recycling or people will stop coming and that would be a real shame. It is a beautiful long stretch of beach which needs to be cleaned up.
review: stretch beautiful go back today high tide see well low tide luck still dirty polluted shame sand wet resembles mud stick paste everything sand stick will brush know local make live many people try sell thing fine walk imagine little annoy decide sit beachi saw heard many people complain skin rash sore swim oceanhopefully bali plan together reduce water pollution increase recycle people will stop come real shame beautiful long stretch need clean

Content: Lots of people, i would shy from the famous beaches if possible.Also, many retailers pushing souvenir sales
review: lot people shy famous beach possiblealso many retailer push souvenir sale

Content: Eh, I don't hate this beach. I love the little evening local market that pops up near the public parking lot. But the beach can be kinda dirty. But it's way better than Kuta!
review: eh dont hate love little even local market pop near public parking lot kinda dirty way well kuta

Content: Beautiful place and was there to see the sunset. It was beautiful! Beach was quite empty which is good :)
review: beautiful place see sunset beautiful quite empty good

Content: The beach was very clean ocean beautiful, nice sun loungers and a stroll over to Ku Du Ta for a great lunch and glass of wine
review: clean ocean beautiful nice sun lounger stroll ku du ta great lunch glass wine

Content: Seminyak beach it's self is pretty average. We had just stayed at Sanur and Nusa Dua which has white sand beaches and clear blue water, we expected the same of Seminyak. This was absolutely not the case. The beach is littered with rubbish, has run off from the drains which makes the area around the outlets brown and brings in even more rubbish and the sand is black, not white!The only positives I can conclude are that the sunsets are amazing from Seminyak Beach and there are many hotels which offer day bed hire, but these are very expensive for Bali. The cheapest we found was IDR 500,000 per day bed (which you can use for food and drink) which can fit 4 people comfortably however others had 6ppl at the Potato Beach Club up to IDR 1,000,000 per person at the gorgeous W Retreat.
review: seminyak self pretty average stay sanur nusa dua white sand beach clear blue water expect seminyak absolutely case litter rubbish run drain make area around outlet brown brings even rubbish sand black whitethe positive conclude sunset amaze seminyak many hotel offer day bed hire expensive bali cheap find idr 500000 per day bed use food drink fit 4 people comfortably others 6ppl potato club idr 1000000 per person gorgeous w retreat

Content: This beach is full of restaurants and beach clubs, really convenient for friends and young families. Clean and warm water.
review: full restaurant club really convenient friend young family clean warm water

Content: The water is warm, the sunset beautiful / the sand covered in rubbish. Don't let your kids go barefoot, I stood on a chicken bone and cut my foot.Otherwise nice.
review: water warm sunset beautiful sand cover rubbish dont let kid go barefoot stood chicken bone cut foototherwise nice

Content: The atmosphere on this outstretched beach is magical! You can have a different sunset painting on the same canvass every night. The restaurants mostly have live bands & specials on cocktails every night. During the day daybeds are available at a nominal (always negotiated!) rate
review: atmosphere outstretched magical different sunset painting canvas every night restaurant mostly live band special cocktail every night day daybeds available nominal always negotiate rate

Content: Even though we went around 9pm the atmosphere was great with music and service. We would definitely come back and spend much more time having a look around.
review: even though go around 9pm atmosphere great music service definitely come back spend much time look around

Content: Overall very nice. There are not too many sunbeds in general, so be aware of this. Best is you use a Beach Club (but also there, be aware that you need to be early to get a sunbed)
review: overall nice many sunbeds general aware best use club aware need early sunbed

Content: The beach is a short walk from Seminkak Square and shopping district. There are umbrellas and lounges to hire and a number of hawkers coming around offering their wares for sale. There are a restaurants and coffee shops near by and a wash down arear to wash of the sand, quite beach good for the little ones.
review: short walk seminkak square shop district umbrella lounge hire number hawker come around offer ware sale restaurant coffee shop near wash arear wash sand quite good little one

Content: Gorgeous sunset on bean bags at beach bars. .. lovely lighting and chilled music. Worth a trip down in the evening for nice pics. Family friendly also with vendors selling nick nacs.
review: gorgeous sunset bean bag bar lovely light chill music worth trip even nice pic family friendly vendor sell nick nac

Content: From morning till sunset and beyond, there is always something going on! Great private beach clubs, or just with a towel and sunscreen, there is no bad way to go!
review: morning till sunset beyond always something go great private club towel sunscreen bad way go

Content: Lovely beach to visit, great sunsets. Love the bands and bean bags. Excellent service at Capil Beach Bar
review: lovely visit great sunset love band bean bags excellent service capil bar

Content: Not really ideal for a swim etc as it seems like there is a lot of rubbish on this side of the island.
review: really ideal swim etc seem lot rubbish side island

Content: I would probably rate this as good but TA doesn't have that rating so...it's not so bad but I'm spoilt with the white sand and clean beaches of Australia.This is a mixture of black volcanic and white sand beach so gives the impression of not being as clean as it could be but the beach is very long and very wide and friendly enough for your kids to paddle in.
review: probably rate good ta doesnt rating soits bad im spoilt white sand clean beach australiathis mixture black volcanic white sand give impression clean long wide friendly enough kid paddle

Content: I first went to Seminyak Beach last year when my wife and I attended a wedding. I could only shoot from the hotel grounds because of lack of time. This time I did some internet research to find out more about this beach, which is just slightly north of Legian and Kuta. I discovered beautiful shots of people having a grand time under giant umbrellas while lying down on giant beanbags. I was determined to shoot the sunset there. As I was staying at The Magani Hotel in Legian and was carrying a heavy camera bag, I took a taxi to Seminyak Beach. The driver dropped me off near Double 6 Seminyak Hotel. From there I just walked to the beach. Instead of writing about what I saw, just take a look at some of the images I shot. You'd wish you were there.
